Summary: The main reason for picking this motel was its proximity to Disneyland. It’s a 15 min walk to the gates. We didn’t want to waste alot of money on a hotel/ motel we would not be in much. For that reason it ticked the box!   Room There was a musky smell to the room which was not pleasant. Had to spray perfume to try a freshen it up, thankfully we were only in the room to sleep. The room was kept very clean.  Breakfast  Don’t worry if you miss breakfast (between 7to10) as it’s only cheap pre packaged muffins and pastries to take away, no very nice. Plus some fruit and hot drinks.   Parking was easy and included in the cost of the room.   Laundry room was very clean about $4 to wash and dry. (We were on a long trip)

We were pleasantly surprised by the Anaheim Islander. We stayed in a room with 2 queens and a sofa bed. The room really had everything we could have wanted at about half the price of the rooms we usually stay in which are directly across from the entrance to Disneyland. This hotel is right next door to a Disney parking lot with a free shuttle to the park. What could be easier than that? The breakfast is grab and go with a few little snacks and fruit. We usually only stay at hotels that offer a full hot breakfast, but right now, no hotels in this area are doing that anyway. They blame covid restrictions, but that's silly, as restaurant buffets are open now and hotels could serve breakfast, too. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites to host your recent stay. We're delighted to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and appreciated our clean and comfortable accommodations, as well as the excellent service our team provides. We consider it a great compliment that you wish to return! We're grateful for your kind comments and hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Stayed here for three  nights.    The price was very good for the room with that in mind do not expect too much.    Firstly it was very clean, as with most guest Disney was the  reason to stay as only 15 min walk to main Disney gate.  There is a shuttle but walking there for us was easy.    There are the plenty of things in the room towels, coffee maker, microwave, fridge, soaps a good A/C and heater, as cold only used heating.   TV and safe     Some negatives, but none would change our minds recommend staying here.    TV remote ours did not work, yes we could have mentioned it but we’re not in room that much and too tired to watch TV.     ( that’s minor isn’t ). Sheet on bed did not quite fit?    Breakfast is I suppose America packet small cakes but there were bananas.   Safe

They were very helpful and pleasant. We stayed two nights in a room with 2 queens and sofa upstairs in the rear part of the motel. No problem with street noise. We appreciated that parking is included unlike most lodging here. The room was spacious and very clean. We could see the fireworks at night from our room. We walked to Cheescake Factory for dinner (yum), and also easily walked to Disneyland from the motel. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: We are very pleased that you have enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your positive feedback. We hope to see you soon on your next visit.

Summary: I highly recommend Anaheim IslanderInn and Suites. We travelled as a family and had such a great time. Very clean rooms, bright and cheerful, modern decor and furnishings , comfy beds , extra bunk bed was an added bonus , awesome heated pool, and staff was so friendly and helpful. Easy 15 min walk to Disneyland. Will definitely book here again.  Donna
Room tip: We had teens , so the pool was great. It has a good deep end 8.5ft deep. Just good to be aware of...
Manager Response: -	It was a pleasure to welcome you at Islander Inn and Suites! We're glad you enjoyed our convenient location, and we trust you had a great night's sleep in our cozy accommodations. Our team hopes you had a phenomenal trip to Disneyland. Thanks for taking the time to share your review, and please allow us another opportunity to serve you whenever you're back in the area!

Summary Heading: Great Choice for DL/DCA - will stay here again if visiting
Summary: I recently stayed here for 3 nights with my 2 daughters, one adult and one high schooler, in room 216 (second floor, no elevator).  The was my first time staying at this property for a seasoned DL/DCA traveler, and I would not hesitate to stay here again.  The proximity to the park was really nice and was an easy walk - especially for my adult daughter with knee issues - and after a long day in the parks. Just a block over to Harbor and then 1.5-2 blocks to DL/DCA entrance (maybe a 15 minute walk at our pace and traffic lights). The area felt very safe and clean, even when returning late at night by ourselves. Walgreens and CVS are right on the corner for first aid (band aids - get them BEFORE you need them.  darn blisters) and drinks/snacks, and trinkets, and ect.  ABC store
Room tip: Try to get a room farther from Katella.
Manager Response: -	Thank you very much for the five-star review as it's everything we always hope for all of our guests. It was our honor to host you at Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Our room had two bedrooms, perfect for getting our boys (ages 3 and 5) to bed early after a long day of fun.  The walk to Disney was quick and easy.  There are many restaurants within walking distance.  The room was fairly quiet, although you can hear people walking and pulling luggage just outside.  Parking was easy, and we were allowed to leave our car here after checkout for a few hours while we finished touring Disney.  The front desk staff was excellent.  Breakfast was sufficient and quick.  I would happily stay here again.
Manager Response: -	We're delighted to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations and provide you with the quality experience that you needed. Our clean, comfortable accommodations, amazing staff, and convenient amenities are all reasons guests love to stay with us, so we're thrilled you appreciated all of that as well. The next time you come to the Anaheim area, we hope you'll allow us to host you again.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay. Our room was perfect,  clean and reasonably priced. It is perfectly located and has awesome customer service too. This was our 6th stay and we will be back next December when we visit Disneyland.
Room tip: Convenient and near a Walgreens for those items you forgot.
Manager Response: -	It was a pleasure hosting you at Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites. We're thrilled that our pleasant accommodations, reasonable rates, and helpful staff made for a memorable stay. Next time, reach out to the front desk team; we're happy to help you out. We cannot wait to see you again.

Summary Heading: Pros and Cons, but Mostly Cons...Pay the Extra Money and Stay Somewhere Else
Summary: We booked the two queen beds and one bunk bed room. When we first walked into the room we passed another room, possibly the laundry room, and the window was open. I smelled a very strong odor similar to propane. We entered our room and our room, too, smelled of propane. Not only that, I was surprised how small the room was because the pictures online make the room look large. It was fine for our small family, but we were cramped while walking around as it's shaped like a corridor. At 6am it sounded like the family above us was going to bust through the floor. I mean you can hear every single step the people above you take.  Since we arrived late I dealt with the smell of the propane but it did give me anxiety through the night that my family was breathing it in. In the morning I
Manager Response: -	Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you enjoyed our newly remodeled accommodations but apologize that you experienced an issue with your stay. Your constructive feedback has been shared, and we appreciate your patience as we worked to make things right. We'd love another opportunity to provide you with a better stay.

Summary: Over the years we have always stayed here.  It is always clean, have never had any issues.  I do not like unclean hotels and this one has always been very clean.  Safe and not too far of a walk to Disneyland.  We come in from AZ and know we don't have to worry about anything with this hotel.
Room tip: Great rooms with families with kids.
Manager Response: -	Your kind words about Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites mean the world to us, and we're delighted to hear that you found our accommodations to be clean and comfortable. We can't wait to host you again, so don't be a stranger anymore.

Summary: I hesitate to share my review for selfish reasons as I want to keep it for my own visits.  If people realize what a hidden gem it is it will get harder to book.  The hotel from the outside looks very non descript.  Its low key and layed back.  What I really liked was it was a mum and pop type business not one of the big brands.  The room we got was on the top floor and had 3 queens in two rooms with a very small bathroom.  It was spotless.  Cleaner than most of the big brands I have stayed at.  Nothing was fancy but everything was clean, comfortable and spacious (except the bathroom).  The bathroom though small was big enough to be comfortable for the week we stayed there.  Unlike big brand hotels they cleaned the rooms every day, had free parking and very low cost laundry.  The
Manager Response: -	We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us at Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites. Attentive service, a fantastic location, and reasonable rates are all aspects of staying with us that our guests can rely on, and we appreciate you taking a moment to highlight them. Thank you for your wonderful review, and we hope you will come back to see us for another excellent trip soon!

Summary Heading: A clean, budget-friendly, conveniently located place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: This is a very nice inn operated by a friendly, considerate couple.  Jyoti was especially kind,  helping me with a bit of grocery shopping as I was on my own with no transportation.  Narin and Ayush at the front desk explained where events and attractions were and helped me with planning things to do, easy ways to get around the neighbourhood, and bookings for Lyft and Uber.  I also appreciated the help with learning to use my new cellphone.  ;)  The rooms are large, very clean and comfortable.  Cleaning staff do an excellent job.  Laundry is available on the second floor; be sure to have lots of quarters as the desk doesn't usually have enough.  The continental breakfast is pretty basic and didn't vary much from packaged Danish-type pastries, bananas, orange juice, and packages
Manager Response: -	We're so pleased to hear our friendly service, ideal location, and quiet accommodations made for a memorable stay at Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites. Thank you for the positive review and our team hopes to host you again soon.

Summary Heading: Gem of a place in Anaheim
Summary: Our family stayed here in July 2022 and found it to be a great place.  Spacious rooms (the separate bedrooms in some of the suites are great for families) with excellent walking distance to Disneyland and a number of amenities.  The continental breakfast was pretty basic but enough to get us all on our way in the morning.  The outdoor pool provided a nice refreshing way to relax at the end of the day.  We'll be back.

We had a great experience at this hotel two weeks ago.  We had two large families going to Disneyland and we booked two double Queen suites. This hotel is the perfect distance for an easy walk to the park and had lots of places to eat within walking distance. The rooms were large and very clean and comfortable. Cleaning staff was amazing! Breakfast was small grab and go type selection that was ideal for us who were headed out for the day. And my kids loved spending time in the pool also. We had such a fun vacation!
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to visit us. It was a pleasure to serve you and we are delighted that the care and dedication of our team stood out. We hope to see you soon again.

Summary: The Islander is run by super friendly people. It’s affordable and close to Disney and the convention center. I never need to rent a car! Perfect mattresses and pillows. The pool is small, but warm and spotless. I’ve stayed here many times and will continue to do so.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the five-star review as it's everything we always hope for all of our guests. It was our honor to host you at Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: I REALLY REALLY like this hotel
Summary: I have now stayed in this hotel twice, once in 2013 as a couple, and now in 2022 with kids (4 & 5). I really, really like this hotel, its exceptionally clean, the staff are very friendly, and it has everything you need if your plans are focused around the Disney parks. The location is good because its a short walk to the parks/food/pharmacies. Parking is readily available, the pool is a decent size and heated (although as a Canadian i've been told my expectations of just how hot a heated pool is, is different than those from a warm climate) but we made good use of the pool regardless on a couple of gloomier 16 degree "C" days. The price point on this place is fantastic for the area, we saved so much vs. going to a hotel on the other side of the road that we decided we would use
Manager Response: We're delighted to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations and provide you with the quality experience that you needed. Our clean, comfortable accommodations, amazing staff, and convenient amenities are all reasons guests love to stay with us, so we're thrilled you appreciated all of that as well. The next time you come to the Anaheim area, we hope you'll allow us to host you again.

Summary: This is a standard motel with rustic charm. It is a basic motel but has everything in the room that you would need especially if you are going to the parks for the day. The staff was friendly. The breakfast is limited to coffee, bananas, and prepackaged pastries.
Manager Response: Your kind words about Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites mean the world to us, and we're delighted to hear that you found our accommodations to be clean and comfortable. We can't wait to host you again, so don't be a stranger anymore.

Summary: We stayed 3 days. We wanted a hotel within walking distance to Disneyland and free parking. It was perfect! Friendly staff, clean up to date room, quiet, 15 minute walk to Disneyland. Great place and great price
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites to host your recent stay. We're delighted to hear that you had an enjoyable experience and appreciated our clean and comfortable accommodations, as well as the excellent service our team provides. We consider it a great compliment that you wish to return! We're grateful for your kind comments and hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Ok budget price but not great
Summary: We had 4 adults stay here last minute for a short Disney trip.   PROS - big rooms, clean, within 3 blocks of Disneyland/California Adventure.   CONS - Unfortunately they did not tell us that the "free parking" was for only 1 car.  We had 2 and since the lot is small, they direct you to parking garage across the street that cost $50 for 2 nights.  Some of the staff were less than helpful/friendly and during our stay there was A LOT of strong marijuana odor near the office (we couldn't figure out if coming from room near there or back office).  They did have some store bought type of small muffins and small coffee, but not really enough to fill you up for breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. Please know our available amenities are listed on our website for our guests to be aware of prior to arrival. We hope you will come back and see us again in the future.

Summary: We are returning guests, having stayed there last year.  We had reservations for tonight, but the pilots strike canceled our flight.  The staff was very accommodating helping us reschedule.  This will forever be our go to hotel when we are in Anaheim!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments with us! It is truly wonderful to know that you enjoyed your overall visit with us and appreciated our fun team members. It will be a pleasure to pass your compliments to them. Happy travel ahead, and come back soon!

Summary: This is our second time staying at the Islander Inn and once again they provided fantastic service! The rooms were exceptionally clean, the complimentary breakfast was a great way to start the day and the staff was super helpful & polite. The location is close enough to Disneyland to walk, there's lots of stores and restaurants close by, and we felt safe regardless of the time. We will definitely be staying here in future Disneyland trips!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the five-star review as it's everything we always hope for all of our guests. It was our honor to host you at Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The hotel was located within easy walking distance to Disneyland. There were plenty of places to eat nearby. Lots of people in the area so it felt safe walking around. The room was clean and comfortable. The staff was friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: We're so glad that our convenient location, well-appointed accommodations, and friendly service helped make your stay at Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites so memorable. We love knowing that you had a great time and look forward to your next trip!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back. The room was pleasant and clean. The property was clean and orderly. Walking distance to Disneyland. The staff was always available and extremely helpful and friendly. Thank you!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us at Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites. We really appreciate your wonderful review. We will soon see you again. Thank you

Summary: Our room at the Anaheim Islander Inn was very spacious, clean, comfortable, reasonably priced, and convenient to freeway access.  It was only a 15-minute walk to Disneyland’s main gate.  There are restaurants, drug stores, and coffee stops all very close by.  We would not hesitate to stay there on our next visit to “The Happiest Place on Earth.”
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing the Islander as your home away from home.  The staff will be thrilled at your feedback. Our location is very central to most attractions in the Anaheim resort area and some within walking distance. We look forward to having you stay with us in the near future. Wish you and your family an amazing 2022

Summary: This is a great value with reasonable rates, super nice staff and very comfortable rooms.  Easy and short walk to Disney.   A must do place to stay in your nest trip to rbis area., you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay. We are thrilled that you had great service. Thank you again. Hope to see you soon on your next adventure!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay. Very clean rooms and friendly staff. We will definitely be staying again.  Walking distance to Disneyland and a Starbucks right next door. Decent spread for the continental breakfast also.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your complimentary words for our staff, they were very happy to read your comments. We're glad that you loved your room as well as our location. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.

Summary Heading: Amazing Disneyland Stay for a Family of 5
Summary: When making this reservation, I was a bit skeptical because the price was so low and the location was so close to Disneyland, but, for a family of 5, three queen beds was appealing, so I booked. When we arrived I was immediately impressed. At check in, the young man was very nice and we got right up to our room, which was huge. It was two rooms with three queen sized beds. The hotel and our room were clean and well-kept. The pool was perfect. And we were only about 3 blocks from Disneyland. I only paid $134 per night for this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay. We are thrilled that you had great service. Thank you again. Hope to see you soon on your next adventure!

Summary Heading: Updated family-friendly hotel near Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: I was pleasantly surprised by this hotel. I've been traveling to the same trade show for more than 20 years and staying at hotels at the lower end of the price spectrum. Those are generally both small and old, and previous experiences with other such hotels led me to expect clean but dingy and dilapidated rooms. The Islander Inn was a pleasant exception to that rule. As convenient to the convention center and Disney as could be asked, the Inn had clearly been very recently completely remodeled. The room was bright and immaculate, had plenty of bed space for families, and was just an overall good place to rest my head after long days. Staff were polite, thoughtful, and efficient. The overall condition of the rooms was much better than those of the giant chain hotel right next to
Manager Response: Dear josephR6734MV,  Thank you for your feedback and kind words. All of us here at the Islander work tirelessly to upkeep and maintain our physical premises as well as provide an amazing customer service experience to all our guests. Thank you for the recognition and the acknowledgement. We are all extremely thrilled! We are constantly upgrading and renovating different parts of our property throughout the year to give our customers the best value for money. We look forward to having you and your families spend many future vacations with us. Best regards to you all from all of us here at the Islander!

Summary Heading: Fantastic suite, great price, and just a short walk to Disneyland!
Summary: We had a fantastic stay!  Our suite was perfect - lots of room for the 4 of us and all our stuff, heaters worked well, beds were very comfy.  Only minor inconvenience was the refrigerator door storage could not be used because all the plastic shelf bars were broken off and missing.  Housekeeping was wonderful, we were very well taken care of.    Took us about 10-12 minutes to walk to Disney front gates.    This was our 2nd time staying here.  Will most definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Dear nwdunnings,  Thank you for your review! We are all thrilled you had a fantastic stay! Our two bedroom suites are very popular with most of our guests with large families. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience with the refrigerator. We are currently looking into it. Thank you again for your loyalty. We look forward to seeing you all soon. Best regards to you and your family!

Summary Heading: Nice place in a good location
Summary: Average motel experience which is what we expected at this price. It is clean and fairly up to date. They were getting ready to put in new TVs. Staff is nice. We appriciated they had a room ready for early check-in. Within walking distance of Anaheim Convention Center as well as many stores and restaurants. Breakfast and WiFi weren't great but acceptable for this price. Will definitely consider this again for another business trip.
Manager Response: Dear Anna H,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience. We are glad you picked us as your place of stay during your business trip. Yes, we are in the process of upgrading our TV’s. We should hopefully complete the project by the end of January. It’s great that we were able to accommodate your early check in request. Our location is central to most attractions in the Anaheim resort area as well as many great stores and restaurants. Thank you for considering us for your next business trip. We look forward to having you here with us.

Summary Heading: A nice place in a good location at a good price
Summary: The Islander is a short walk to the Anaheim Convention Center, Disneyland, lots of food options, and even the House of Blues. There is no giant, marble covered lobby that makes you feel like you are throwing away money. Just a nice, simple place to stay with comfortable beds and the normal amenities of home. The staff is nice and they are quick to deal with any issues. Oh, and the price is great for what you get. I like it.
Manager Response: Dear 319clydec,  Thank you for choosing the Islander as your home away from home. We are glad you received great value for your money. Yes, we are a small establishment but we always aspire to provide great customer service! The staff will be thrilled at your feedback. Our location is very central to most attractions in the Anaheim resort area and some within walking distance. We look forward to having you stay with us in the near future. Wish you and your family an amazing 2020!

Summary: Our family loves this hotel and we have stayed here many times. Our recent stay was over the Thanksgiving week and then again in December. We love the new upgraded floors. The hotel is quiet and an easy 10min walk to Disneyland. There are multiple shops and restaurants nearby but each room has a decent size fridge and microwave. Staff is always friendly and welcoming. They have always been accommodating in allowing us to arrive early and stay late with our vehicles so we can go to Disney. The breakfast has always been nice with various pastries, oatmeal, fruit, coffee, juice, and cocoa. Perfect for a quick grab and go on the way out. The rooms are larger than most and staff does an excellent job cleaning. Anytime we have had an issue staff has always been quick to respond. We
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay. We are thrilled that you had great service. Thank you again. Hope to see you soon on your next adventure!

Summary: Hello Kind People at Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites,  Just wanted to say thank you for the great stay.  My daughter and I were in the LA area for a concert and decided to so some Downtown Disney shopping while we were so close.  The Anaheim Islander was the perfect location.  We got to sleep in after a late night in LA and still had lunch and went shopping at Downtown Disney to make it back to the Metro Phoenix, Arizona area by early evening.  Great staff and great location.  Next trip to Disneyland or any event near the LA area this is where we will stay.  Very comfortable and easy check in and check out.     Thank you all so much!  Ms. Rees  Arizona
Manager Response: We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your complimentary words for our staff, they were very happy to read your comments. We're glad that you loved your room as well as our location. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.

Summary: This was a cute little great place to stay!! The front desk was on point from check in to check out! I even asked if was okay to leave my vehicle while I walk around a bit after checking out. I would def stay here again. My family loved it!! And its two blocks away from disney! Great walk to disney as well!!
Manager Response: Dear Rachaelh12416,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are thrilled that you had a wonderful experience with our service. We do our best to go above and beyond to accommodate any special requests that customers may have whenever possible. Yes, the walk to Disney parks is easy and takes about 10 to 15 minutes depending on the pace. Thank you for your loyalty. We would love to see you and your family on your next family outing to Disneyland. Season’s greetings from our entire team here at the Islander.

Summary: This is my third time staying here with my family. We came in November for my birthday. This little  motel doesn't disappoint. Everyone who is associated with this establishment  is very nice & welcoming. I noticed they changed out the carpet for vinyl flooring which was great for clean up of spills of soda. I really like this place because I felt safe & comfortable in the room.  There is a Walgreen,CVS,& 7/11 at all the corners. They serve a complimentary breakfast danishes, oatmeal,fruit ,coffee, tea, & milk. There is a IHOP around the corner if you want something heartier. Thank you Anaheim Islander for a great stay !!! We will be back next year!
Manager Response: Dear Mikesmommy 07,  Thank you very much for being one of our loyal customers. Most of our customers are repeats and referrals. We heavily rely on your feedback to keep making this place better. Our staff will be thrilled with your compliments. They do their very best to make all our guests feel special and welcomed! Yes, we did replace all the carpets with hard flooring. Almost all our customers have given us a positive feedback regarding this. We are lucky to be located close to many useful businesses especially being a ten minute walk away from Disneyland and the Anaheim convention center. We look forward to seeing you and your next year. Happy holidays to you all!

Summary: ok im a 54 yr old very young woman lol  i stayed from the 6th nov to the 17th nov i arrived by 9am on the 6th from australia and they were kind enough to let me check in i had request earlier to have a top floor room which they granted i was in room 208 the room looked fresh and clean not sure if it had been painted recently but the flooring was new it was like a wood look vinyl th room was big it had two beds a pullout sofa in room safe iron and ironing board..it also had mini fridge microwave i went to target to buy a cheap toaster and had brekky in my room every morning i also took my travel kettle for my coffee fix..starbucks was just a few metres up the road a strip of shops on the corner for chinese subway etc it was only a 10 to 15 min walk to the park... hey i knew i
Manager Response: Dear Paula,  Thank you for taking the time to write a wonderfully descriptive review about your experience with us. We are extremely glad that we were able to help you out with your special requests. We always try to go above and beyond to make all our customers stays memorable ones. You seemed to be like a well-seasoned traveler who does a lot of traveling. Your compliments are we received by all our staff. Housekeeping is especially thrilled by your kind words. We try to be very competitive with our prices but yet keep our high standard of service as much as possible. Yes, we did change our flooring from carpets to wood just last month. Glad you noticed and appreciate it! Best regards and holiday wishes to you and your family in Australia. We hope to see you on your next Disney adventure!

Summary: We booked to stay 1 night and duev to a change of plans requested at the last minute a night earlier also. We were booked no problem & made very welcome.  Very clean rooms and position & price also.  The staff were very obliging and made our stay very comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Val N,  We are thrilled that you experienced great hospitality. Thank you for the five star rating. The staff is thrilled! Glad to be of service to you and your family. Happy holidays!

Summary: We stayed 6 days the last week of Sept. 2019. This was our 3rd stay and like our previous stays, it was great. We had fresh towels, coffee basket refills and our room cleaned every day. Having a micro wave and mini frig was an extra added perk. We stopped by a local store on the way to the hotel, picked up some food supplies which helped us save money.  With the hotel being so close to Disneyland we were able to eat breakfast at the hotel, return at midday for lunch and a nap, then back to Disneyland for the evening. The front desk was there to provide answers to any questions that we had.  When we accidently left a bag in our room, we call the Islander and they held our bag for us. I keep a pretty tight budget so I researched hotels, prices and extra perks for every Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Coastal140020,  We are extremely glad that you guys had an amazing experience with us. We always try to go the extra mile to satisfy all our guests’ needs. Your loyalty is very much appreciated. We look forward to having you here during your next vacation soon.

Summary: I would like to start by saying that it took us 5 hours longer (for a total of 12 hours on the road)to arrive at your place due to the Santa Clarita fires. When we arrived I was extremely tired and grumpy and my first interaction with with AJ. Let me just say he was AWESOME. He quickly got us checked in and when he found out why it took us so long, he even called another guest on their way to give them a heads up so they might not have to go through the same thing. We got to our room (we usually stay at another hotel down the road, but we chose this one because we had 7 people and the other hotel could not accommodate us all in one room) and we were pleasantly surprised. The room had the 4 queen beds and was very clean and spacious(I only wish it had 2 bathrooms but beggars cant
Manager Response: Dear Mellisa75,  Thank you very much for staying with us on your vacation. We sincerely appreciate your detailed review. This helps us identify our strengths and weaknesses. Even though we have been in this industry for over two decades, we are still learning something new every single day. Your stay here seemed bitter sweet. We would definitely like to make it just sweet the next time.   If you do decide to come try us out in the near future, please do contact AJ or the management so we could ensure that all your needs will be taken care of when you get here. You guys were amazing guests! We are very sorry that we fell short. Thank you and have a wonderful holiday season with your beautiful family!

Summary: We just stayed first week in October. Love that this motel is just off the beaten path. Nice large clean rooms. Nice size frig, microwave and coffee pot. For everything that you get.. the price is unbeatable.   Short walk to Disneyland. We have stayed several times and won’t stay anywhere else. Staff is also very friendly and helpful. I totally recommend the Anaheim Islander inn and Suites.
Manager Response: Dear Susan B,  Thank you for the amazing review! We are extremely happy that you had a wonderful experience with us. Thank you very much for the recommendations and your continued loyal patronage.

Summary Heading: Average... but that's not a bad thing
Summary: I gave this place three stars because that's what an average rating is. There is nothing fancy about this place. It serves it's purpose if you're just looking for a base near Disneyland.  Pros: Location - Just off the intersection of Katella Avenue and Harbour Blvd. About a 10-15 minute walk to the gates. Right down the street are several chain restaurants.  Cost - Paid $129 per night + tax in mid-September.  Rooms - The room had two beds plus a sofa but was still roomy.  A/C - I am a light sleeper and have had issues in the past with loud ACs. No issue here. The unit was very quiet.    Free parking  Cons: Breakfast - No much to choose from. Prepackaged danish and muffins, fruit and instant oatmeal.  Carpet - Needs to be cleaned or replaced. My feet were black after walking on
Manager Response: Dear JAR713,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. Yes, many of our guests love the fact that we are located within walking to the park. We apologize for the carpets. This is usually the result of reminiscence of tar from the parking lot that follow our guests on the bottom of their feet :) We do carpet deep cleaning periodically. Unfortunately, daily vacuuming does not solve this issue. Thank you again for your patronage. We very much appreciate it!

Summary: Had a 2 night stay used it for a base to go to Los Angeles very clean and tidy close to Disney and value for money complimentary breakfast continental orange juice tea n coffee milk cereals bars value for Money
Manager Response: Dear garethg1982,  Thank you very much for your feedback! Yes, we have many guests who stay with us and travel north to LA and south to San Diego. It can be very central to most guests exploring southern California. Glad you enjoyed the complimentary continental breakfast. We look forward to seeing you again on your next vacation soon.

Summary: Very clean spacious rooms with an outstanding staff!!! Very friendly and accommodating! I would definitely recommend this hotel!    We were a large group and needed extra towels and blankets and they were delivered immediately. Small but nice continental breakfast with coffee, danishes, fruit, oatmeal etc.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin m,  The staff is thrilled with your response. Thanks a lot for the compliments. We consider our customers’ needs the highest priority always! Happy to go the extra mile to make your stay memorable! Our two bedroom suites are very popular amongst large groups and families who are inseparable. Thank you again for recommending us.

Summary Heading: Love going to this hotel when we go to Disney Land. We use to take our kids there and now they take their kids.
Summary: The staff is very nice and always very polite. I feel that they are very family oriented and make sure you feel at home, always accommodating. It's nice to be able to walk there from Disney Land and not have to wait for long shuttle lines to the parking place.
Manager Response: Dear Scott H,  We are extremely humbled by your kind words. Your family is officially an Islander family. We thank you and your family for your loyalty. We are family owned and we do our best to treat all our guests like family. Not surprisingly, most of our customers our repeats. We enjoy building mutually beneficial long lasting relationships with our guests. We hope to see you and your family during the upcoming holidays. Best regards to you and your family from all of us here.

Summary: Awesome place to stay management was awesome had a lot of fun very very close to Disneyland highly recommended for family and friends the manager went out of his way for me by faxing things to me to make sure my stay was wonderful thank you again
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay. We are thrilled that you had great service. Thank you again. Hope to see you soon on your next adventure!

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland and good value!
Summary: We just returned from California for 2 weeks. We looked at many different locations prior to booking this location. Most were very expensive (considering we were going during the peak summer period and expected this). But was pleasantly surprised to find this Inn so close and at such a great value. The room suite of family of four perfectly. Beds were comfortable, clean and came with the usual coffee maker, fridge and microwave. Breakfast is simple and got us going for the days at the park: oatmeal, muffins, coffee and fresh fruit. Parking is free as well and that was a blessing. There is staff on-site 24/7 and we felt safe with our stuff.   The walk to Disneyland and California Adventure Park is about 20 minutes to the front entrances (bus loop). Along the way there is a 7-11
Manager Response: We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your complimentary words for our staff, they were very happy to read your comments. We're glad that you loved your room as well as our location. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.

Summary: We stayed here in March for the first time ever. Our room was clean and spacious for the 6 of us. If your looking for clean, friendly customer service and a short 10-15min walk this place will get the job done. We have placed this little hotel on our list of favorites near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words! As much as you loved staying here we loved having you here as our guests. Thank you again for taking the time to write about us. We look forward to seeing you here on your next adventure!

Summary: Clean and comfortable rooms. Close to Disneyland. Walk in 10 or 15 minutes. Booked this as was close with free wi fi, free parking and continental breakfast. Wi fi was hit and miss. Get it ok out of the room but often lost it in the room? Parking good. Continental breakfast to me means cereal and toast. Th e y have porridge and pastries available to take back to your room. I thought their choices were terrible.  A credit to management they agreed to go and buy and put  in our room cereal, milk, bread and butter and Apple juice. Supplied also bowls and spoons. We really appreciated their efforts.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We always strive to provide the very best of service to all our guests.We look forward to having you back as our guests in the near future.

Summary: I'm giving this hotel 5 stars because I went in knowing I was booking no-frills lodging in an area that has many higher-end hotels (such as the Disney hotels themselves) and I found it to be a much better value than I expected. When spending less than $200/night for lodging in a popular tourist area at peak season, I didn't expect the following pleasant surprises:  - Free parking on site - Spotlessly clean and comfortable room - Room was ready for check-in early (11:00 am) - Location really was an easy walk to the parks  If you are on a budget and planning a Disneyland vacation, you know you're going to spend a LOT on the park tickets, so an affordable hotel nearby that isn't a dump is a huge bonus. This place was not only NOT a dump, it was one of the better basic hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay. We are thrilled that you had great service. Thank you again. Hope to see you soon on your next adventure!

Summary: We very much enjoyed our stay. The hotel was clean, quiet and well managed. The location was great - just a couple of blocks from Disneyland and close to restaurants and Starbucks. Great value. I would recommend it.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. We're glad that you loved your room as well as our location. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.

Summary: We stayed here for a week while we were visiting Disneyland and other local attractions.  We booked a 3 bed suite but were upgraded to the 4 queen suite. That worked well as we had 6 of us staying.   Pros— walking distance to the parks. Even my 7 year old could handle the walk after a day in the park. Also close enough that we would go early, play until everyone was tired.  Head out of the park and eat lunch, go to the hotel for a nap and swimming, then back into the park for the evening.  Also close walk to several food establishments, Walgreens and cvs (they both have a lot of Disney souvenirs).  The front office staff was helpful.   Cons-  One bathroom (tiny bathroom) for 6 people is a juggle.  The rollaway bed that my youngest slept on was all springs.  Luckily he didn’t
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. Your feedback is extremely important to us. There seems to have been quite a few issues you have experienced during your stay. We would like to sincerely apologies to you  and we are currently looking into this point by point. As a customer of our establishment we expect you to receive best of service at all times.

Summary: There are many hotels to choose from in the immediate vicinity of Disneyland.  Keep checking prices when shopping for a room as they can vary from week to week and even from day to day.    As others have noted, the Islander Inn is in a very convenient location, just a 10-15 minute walk from the park entrance.  It's an older property but well-maintained and updated.  Beds and bedding were comfortable and the desk staff was pleasant and friendly.  The included breakfast consists of packaged pastries, coffee, orange juice, oranges, and bananas.  Our room was nice and quiet to return to after frenetic days at the Disney parks.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay. We are thrilled that you had great service. Thank you again. Hope to see you soon on your next adventure!

Summary: The rooms and grounds were very nice. Beds were firm. Maid service was good except they would start cleaning very early. We were in a downstairs room and the vacuuming in the morning was bad. We could also hear the guests above us. It would have been better to have waited until 9:00 or 10:00. The provided breakfast was very minimal. We walked to Starbucks just down the street. The hotel is close enough to restaurants and Disneyland so you can walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and suggestions. Your input as a guest is very important to us in maintaining and excelling in our service. We are glad that you had a pleasant memorable first trip. We loved having you all as our guests. Hope to see you soon in the near future. Best Regards to you and your family!

Summary: Our family has stayed here multiple times over the last 2 years. Every time was exceptional. Staff is friendly and welcoming. Rooms are large and clean. Breakfast is simple but a nice offering. The hotel is close to multiple restaurants and within a 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Everytime we have gone the staff has upgraded our room. You really can't beat the price. Thank you to the staff for always being accommodating and caring towards our family. We will be back in May!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your complimentary words for our staff, they were very happy to read your comments. We're glad that you loved your room as well as our location. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again.

Summary: Stayed here for two nights as part of our California vacation.  Picked this hotel because it has good reviews, rooms with 2 separate bedroom areas and within walking distance of Disneyland.   We somehow hit no traffic from LA to Anaheim and arrived at the hotel around 10:30am.  We were allowed to check in and they "upgraded" us from a 3 bed room to a 4 bed room.  The room had a weird aroma, we hoped it would go away, it did not.  Wasn't enough to ask to switch rooms, but did leave us with an queasy feeling.    The pictures you see on their website are exactly what the room is, nothing more.   The free parking and close proximity to DL are definitely selling points, but next time we will be staying somewhere else.
Manager Response: Dear Rockland_travels,  Thank you for staying with us on your vacation. We are very sorry to hear about your experience during your stay. We would have gladly changed the room for you at any point during your stay. If you happen to change your mind to try us out again, we would love to offer you a free upgrade. Please let us know. Our sincerest apologies once more.

Summary Heading: Outstanding Family Accommodation in an amazing location!
Summary: We have been to the islander inn two times and are returning for a third time later in the year. It is a lovely quiet wee motel with a great pool that you have to yourself most of the time and a 2 minute walk from Starbucks and a block of restaurants including Pizza, Mexican and Chinese. It is about a 10 minute walk from Disneyland and you pass a 7/11 on the way. I absolutely loved my stay there and would HIGHLY recommend this motel. As perfect as it could get :)
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words! As much as you loved staying here we loved having you here as our guests. Thank you again for taking the time to write about us. We look forward to seeing you here on your next adventure!

Summary: This was our second time staying here and like the first time, the hotel was great.  The staff is always very friendly and helpful.  We stayed in a 3 queen suite and it was a perfect fit for our family. The room was clean and comfortable. There's always parking available, the free continental breakfasts were nice and the hotel is a very short walk to the Disney Parks. Awesome hotel and we highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your complimentary words for our staff, they were very happy to read your comments. We're glad that you loved your room as well as our location. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.

Summary: This motel is within a brisk 15 min. walk from the entrance to Disneyland.  As such, it is one of the few left of the old style motels which used to surround the property.  We found it clean and very quiet which are two things we look for. The beds were comfortable and we could adjust the temp in the room.  We had a small fridge and microwave.  AND it had a bath tub. If we were to stay there again we would take pottery/ china mugs ( as there was only Styrofoam) and a travel kettle to make tea or heat water. There is a tiny coffee maker but only regular coffee.  No decaf.  Breakfast was sweet things.  Pastries and sweetened instant oatmeal.  But the bananas and oranges were lovely.  Although we did not have the time or weather to enjoy the pool we are told it is kept at 80
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay. We are thrilled that you had great service. All your concerns are taken seriously in order to better ourselves. Thank you again. Hope to see you soon on your next adventure!

Summary: From the moment we arrived, mid-morning, the staff was friendly and most accommodating. We were three families; one with a suite and the other two left to share a room. Upon seeing the suite, I asked if they had another, knowing they were nearly fully booked. Turns out they did. I highly recommend getting the suite if you have a party of 3 or more. The beds & pillows are quite comfortable and the room is clean. Each suite is roomy enough with tables and chairs, a decent sized refrigerator, a microwave, and a nice little coffee pot with really weak coffee packets. However, they sacrificed bathroom space for the rooms. Since our rooms were ready, they allowed us to put our luggage in the room before our trek down Harbor St. to the most wonderful place on earth (tongue in cheek),
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words! As much as you loved staying here we loved having you here as our guests. Thank you again for taking the time to write about us. We look forward to seeing you here on your next adventure!

Summary: Close to Disneyland, very comfortable beds, very clean, very reasonable rates and a friendly helpful staff staff.  Quiet location, heated pool and very private rooms.  Most rooms have  doors to the bedrooms for privacy.  Free parking and Internet.  We'd return anytime.  AAAAA+++++*****.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the overwhelming positive review from your stay. We are absolutely thrilled that we got things perfect with you. We really enjoyed having you here as our guests and look forward to serving soon on your next escape to Disney!

Summary: We stayed here because it’s mear favorite attractions like Disneyland and Knott’s Berry Farm. Just down the street are restaurants, Starbucks,and 2 drug stores.  The  room was spacious enough.  The beds were comfortable and the pillows squishy.  TV had many channels. WiFi worked fine. However we could hear the floors creaking from the guests above.  The air conditioner/heater was very noisy when it was on. The continental breakfast consisted of bananas and oranges, many packaged pastries, oatmeal packets, and coffee, tea, and hot cocoa. The ‘heated’ pool was too cool for my liking.
Manager Response: Dear Karen O,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are extremely glad you enjoyed the location. It is very conveniently and centrally located to all the attractions in Anaheim. The management sincerely apologizes for your experience with creaking floors. We usually suggest downstairs rooms for light sleepers. Have a fantastic 2019! We look forward to having you stay with us on your next California adventure.

Summary: The only reason why not 5 stars is the towel quality, something my family is picky about. Beds are comfortable, rooms are comfortable and clean, and the location is great for walking to Disney.  Staff was polite and we had no issues during our stay. Our schedule did not let us try to the free breakfast, maybe next time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and suggestions. Your input as a guest is very important to us in maintaining and excelling in our service. We are glad that you had a pleasant memorable first trip. We loved having you all as our guests. Hope to see you soon in the near future. Best Regards to you and your family!

Summary: Stayed here for 9 nights and was our base for doing all the theme parks including Disney and Knotts berry farm . The staff were wonderful and extremely helpful. We walked to Disneyland easily from this location and there is a bus stop directly out the front if needed we walked but my elderly dad used the bus a few times. The rooms were quite large and very clean i thought the price of this inn was amazing considering the location and it is very close to some higher priced accommodation there is a Walgreens ,pizza ,Starbucks within 50 meters . If you are on a budget but still want a clean comfortable place to stay I would look no further then this inn I was very glad we decided to stay here you just can’t beat it for price , location and cleanliness 👍
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us. We are glad that you had an enjoyable vacation. Your review will help us better our quality and service. Have a merry Christmas and a fantastic new year!

Summary: This is our second time back at this cozy motel. I like this motel b/c it's clean &  the staff are super nice!!!! I think every room has a fridge & microwave which is fantastic !!! And they were clean!!!! This is your basic no frills motel that is better than others because the staff were always friendly & nice. It's about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland. There's a Starbucks, Blaze Pizza,CVS , Walgreens,& 7/11.Across the street there's a strip mall which has good Mexican & an IHOP around the corner. They have complimentary breakfast which is good. This is my go to hotel whenever we come back to Disneyland! !!Thanks Anaheim Islander for a great stay! !!!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the overwhelming positive review from your stay. We are absolutely thrilled that we got things perfect with you. We really enjoyed having you here as our guests and look forward to serving soon on your next escape to Disney!

Summary Heading: Only main drawback is the breakfast
Summary: I’m normally a religious review reader so not sure how I missed the memo that the breakfast is pretty much nothing. That is literally the only drawback of this hotel that will make me not return. Location was ok. Easy walk to and from with Disney. Lots of shopping around, Walgreens and cvs practically next to along with bubba gumps and a Starbucks. Pool is nothing to brag about but it’s there, just no hot tub which is needed becAuse walking around the parks all day you need a good soak. We got there around 11 and was so glad that our hotel was ready since we had been driving thru the night! We even got upgraded to a family suite which was amazing! Loved having the bunks for the kids. Hotel was clean, since we got there early and never moved the car, parking was never an issue
Manager Response: Thank you for making the Islander your choice of stay. We like to think of our place as an affordable place for families hoping to get the best value during their vacation. Our humble breakfast consists of Danish pastries, muffins, fresh oranges, oatmeal, hot chocolate, hot tea, orange juice & fresh coffee every morning. Your input as a guest is very important to us in maintaining and excelling in our service. We are glad that you had a pleasant memorable first trip. We loved having you all as our guests. Hope to see you soon in the near future. Best Regards to you and your family!

Summary: Our group of 7 had 4 nights in the 2 bedroom (4 queen bed) suite at Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites.  The only downfall to this room was only 1 bathroom.  But, we made it work!  The price was VERY reasonable!  We loved how close the hotel was to Walgreens.  We made nightly trips there to pick up food and other supplies.  Room was equipped with 2 tvs, a microwave and refrigerator.  The hotel is close enough to walk to Disney in 15 minutes.  Even my father at 60+ years old and two bad knees was able to make the trip back and forth walk to the parks.  We tried the ART shuttle once.  (purchased our tickets at the front desk.  bus stopped right in front of the hotel).  Not our cup of tea!  Preferred walking.  The hotel is also in close proximity to some souvenir shops, a pizza place
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay. We are thrilled that you had great service. Thank you again. Hope to see you soon on your next adventure!

Summary: When looking for hotel in Anaheim near Disneyland there are plenty of the big brand hotels and they charge accordingly. Islander inn and suites is a small hotel but was clean, had free parking and the staff were friendly.  The room was very clean and had all the normal facilities. Coffee maker, fridge comfy beds and clean bathroom. Close to everything, 15 to 20 Minute walk to Disneyland gate. 2 minute walk to restaurants, CVS and Walgreens. Great location to get to freeway easy. Plenty of coffee shops close by. Breakfast is included however as they state on the website is only orange juice, coffee, pastries and fruit. We didn’t like the pastries but coffee, juice and banana was a good start to the day, ihop was just around the corner for a special treat. We had a good stay comfy
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words! As much as you loved staying here we loved having you here as our guests. Thank you again for taking the time to write about us. We look forward to seeing you here on your next adventure!

Summary: Excellent property! Built in 1964, this is a classic, vintage 2-floor Southern California U-shaped motel just off Harbor and Katella and located at a nice walking distance to the Disneyland main gate. This property is similar to the classic Alpine Inn and Candy Cane Inn nearby. I stayed in a family room that included 2 comfortable queen sized beds, a sofa bed, and a bunk bed. The room was spotlessly clean and nicely updated with modern furnishings and bedding. Microwave and tall-sized mini fridge, power ports, and a quiet AC and heating unit. Crystal-clear satellite TV reception. Front desk staff were consistently friendly and accommodating. A compact but sparkling pool is located in the front of the property. Next door is a Walgreen’s and a pizza place. I’d stay here again!
Manager Response: We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your complimentary words for our staff, they were very happy to read your comments. We're glad that you loved your room as well as our location. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.

Summary: My daughter and i stayed at The Anaheim Islander Inn   in order to visit Disneyland,  this was the first time we have stayed at the Islander Inn,   We had a very comfortable stay   Our room was clean and our stay both quiet and comfortable,   Many of the motels we usually stay at for going into Disneyland now charge quite a fee to park in their motel,  The islander Inn does not charge that parking fee. The staff is both friendly and helpful. ,   I would  choose the Islander Inn again when visiting Disneyland     Sincerely   Michael Scully
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the overwhelming positive review from your stay. We are absolutely thrilled that we got things perfect with you. We really enjoyed having you here as our guests and look forward to serving soon on your next escape to Disney!

Summary: We stayed here for a few nights and have about three times now! Great location, close to Disneyland (offers a shuttle there as well - but we walked), close to restaurants and stores, pharmacy located less than 100m from the Inn. The pool area is a great spot to relax in. Breakfast is included at reception! The rooms are spacious, only complaint would be the bathroom size, more room is needed. We stayed in a 4 x double-bedded room which fits 8 people, and unfortunately there was only one bathroom and shower for all of us to share. Overall, great motel.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words! As much as you loved staying here we loved having you here as our guests. Thank you again for taking the time to write about us. We look forward to seeing you here on your next adventure!

Summary: The room was clean and a good size and the manager/owner of the property was very accommodating for a late checkout at no charge. We will definitely stay here again.Big plus is the free parking as many motels near Disneyland charge for parking
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay. We are thrilled that you had great service. Thank you again. Hope to see you soon on your next adventure!

Summary: Walking distance to Disneyland and is surrounded by budget and lux eateries. Old style motel but was clean, reception friendly and comfy beds. Walgreens , ihop , Cheesecake Factory , cvs pharmacy , Starbucks all close by. Go to Blaze pizza - super fresh food, choose your own toppings for 9.95 - short walk from the room.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. We're glad that you loved your room as well as our location. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.

Summary Heading: You get what you pay for
Summary: I previously reviewed this property saying you get a lot more than what you pay for.  I also gave it a five star review.  The advantage is it’s capacity, price, and close proximity to Disney.    This was our third time staying here and we were disappointed.  Issue #1 - they had our room ready, but the AC was off so it was 90 degrees in there.  Issue #2 Shower didn’t work.  Issue #3 Very uncomfortable towels - they rubbed your skin off.  Issue #4 - after coming back from a 10 hour day at Disney each day, and 10 miles of walking, they shut our AC off to the room.  We then had to wait in a hot room for an hour for it to cool down.  Seriously?  You are that cheap?  Will be trying a new location next time.
Manager Response: Dear John W,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. First and foremost, I would like to sincerely apologize for your experience. We are currently looking into your matter in detail and will be discussing it with the concerned staff. We value your loyalty. Please do give us another try so we can make it up to you. Have a wonderful weekend!

Summary Heading: Excellent choice for a stay close to Disney
Summary: I stayed here recently for a couple of days to visit Disney. I normally pay to stay in more expensive hotels, but this trip was on a budget so I was looking for somewhere reasonably priced and within walking distance to the parks. The Islander Inn was great - a decent size room, comfortable bed, quiet and clean. The breakfast was included and consisted of fresh fruit such as bananas and apples, juice, yoghurts, and pre-packed pastries and muffins, with tea and coffee - certainly enough to get you going on your day ahead.   There are numerous restaurants within walking distance (5 mins or so) literally just down the road, and Disney can be reached within 10-15 mins walk, depending on your pace. Plus there is a CVS, Walgreens and 7/11 a couple of mins walk away, so easy to stock
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words! As much as you loved staying here we loved having you here as our guests. Thank you again for taking the time to write about us. We look forward to seeing you here on your next adventure!

Summary: The pictures do not do this hotel justice.  Looks much nicer in person.  Best beds I have ever slept in away from home.  The breakfast was sufficient to get us to lunch. FREE parking was huge for us.  We walked each day to the Disney parks in 15 minutes. We were able to purchase the few items that we forgot at the Walgreen's or CVS just minutes away.  If we ever some back we will book here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kenneth T,  We are totally flattered by your words. Thanks a lot for sharing your thoughts. Our location is very central and convenient to Disneyland and the convention center. We loved having you stay with us and look forward to seeing you all on your next Disney Escape. Have a fantastic rest of the year!

Summary: Stayed on our family trek to Disneyland.  We had a suite with two queens and a room with a queen. Excellent location for walking to the park... takes you about 15mins max. Rooms were spotless and front desk was very nice at check in. This place has a small pool which was a bonus to relax at after a hard day of walking and lines....lol. Close walking also to alot of great places to eat too. We would stay here again... when we do another coastal drive from BC. Enjoy your visit.
Manager Response: Dear bigcahoon,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write about you experience with us. We are glad you enjoyed our spacious two bedroom suite. Many places close by to eat as you mentioned. Some are open 24 hours like the subway, Walgreens and CVS if you prefer picking up a midnight snack. Hope you had a wonderful coastal drive on the PCH back home to Canada. Have a great weekend!

Summary: 3 day stay. Smooth check in. No incidental fee, just a 50$ charge to your credit card day before stay, if that goes through then youre all set. You get it back at the end. Comfy beds! Located walking distance to cvs and walgreens. Disneyland 20 minute walk. Breakfast is prepackaged pastries, coffee, hot chocolate, oatmeal, tea, bananas and oranges. Grab and go is usually fine for me. Ice machine by the pool. Laundry on site. Microwave,  fridge, hairdryer,  iron,  safe in room. Everything works well. No complaints here. Would recommend!
Manager Response: Dear alondra d,  We really appreciate the recommendation. We are really happy that you had a great stay. Thank you for writing a descriptive review. It really helps our future guests make informed decisions. We really hope to see you all soon. Have a fabulous weekend!

Summary Heading: Great Family Motel that is Walking Distance to Disneyland and Restaurants
Summary: We stayed here three days visiting Disneyland.  We had a suite that was well suited for three adults and three children.  The room was very clean, safe and the beds were comfortable.  We enjoyed the pool and the location is perfect to lots of restaurants, Walgreens/CVS and we could walk to Disneyland entrance.  It is a bit of a walk but pleasant under all the palm trees. They also have a modest breakfast area in lobby.  Price of room was reasonable for what you get.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Durbanguy,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay. We are pleased that you had a great stay with us. The location is perfect for Disney as you mentioned. Housekeeping will be very pleased with your review. Thanks for letting us know.. Book early to lock in those reasonable rates. We hope to see you soon on your next Disney adventure!

Summary Heading: Clean, comfortable and close to Disneyland
Summary: Our rooms were clean, appeared recently updated, and spacious.  IThe overall impression was that it was well maintained and managed.  It was also quiet with excellent air conditioning.  It was close enough to walk to Disneyland or a $6 Lyft fare home.  Starbucks is a few steps away.  Try the little pizza shop on the corner of the block of eateries on the way to Disneyland.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your complimentary words for our staff, they were very happy to read your comments. We're glad that you loved your room as well as our location. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.

Summary Heading: Quiet safe inn, walking distance to Disneyland with spacious rooms!
Summary: We spent two nights here when traveling with 2 teens and a 10 year old.  We chose it because it had a room with two queens and bunk beds.  Traveling with a lot of children, I typically don't choose to stay in motel-style facilities, but the Islander Inn and Suites has won me over. It was safe, it was clean, it was perfect! I left a "SPECIAL REQUEST" for a sign celebrating my kid's birthday and when we checked in there was a sign and balloons up in the room!!  It was great!! Highlights:   - Super clean and well kept.   - The staff could not possibly have been nicer.   - One of the teens left his AirPods - they immediately called us to alert us that we had left them in the room.   - Really quiet.  No street noise, no party noise, no noise at all.  The place was pretty full, and
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words! As much as you loved staying here we loved having you here as our guests. Thank you again for taking the time to write about us. We look forward to seeing you here on your next adventure!

Summary: Close enough to walk to the park, but the shuttle stop is right out front.  Very clean and felt updated.  the pool was nice.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The bottom bunk was a double bed so we were able to cram 2 kids there.  Overall, it was a great room and we will stay there in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the overwhelming positive review from your stay. We are absolutely thrilled that we got things perfect with you. We really enjoyed having you here as our guests and look forward to serving soon on your next escape to Disney!

Summary: We reserved our week several months in advance since there are only a few suites on the property. The rooms were clean, well-maintained, comfy mattresses, pillows and linens. We were well supplied w/ towels for the six of us staying (3 adults & 3 grands), but only one bath w/two doors connecting with each BR. Hotel management was terrific, very helpful, Disney Shuttle stops right in front of hotel, front desk sells shuttle tickets and Disney tickets, but if you like to walk, Disney is only a few blocks away. Continental breakfast consists of pastries, orange juice, coffee, fresh whole fruit, and some mornings instant oatmeal. Great restaurants across the street, also cool indoor play at Billy Beez in the Garden Walk. Hotel has an outdoor pool protected by stucco walls and well
Manager Response: Dear Diane U,  Thank you for taking the time to do a detailed review of your stay. We are thrilled that you had a wonderful experience with our staff and the management was helpful. Our property location is very central to most attractions in southern California and only a 10 to 15 minute walk to Disneyland and California adventure.   The Anaheim resort transit has a stop right in front of our property and frequents every 20 minutes. Daily passes could be purchased at the front desk for your convenience along with Disney and universal studio tickets.  We apologize for the carpets. Thank you for letting us know so we could rectify the situation. We hope you would come visit us on you next Disney Adventure!

Summary Heading: Second and Third Stay at Islander
Summary: We first stayed at the Islander in June of 2016 and returned in June of 2018.  We found the property just as clean and well maintained as the first time around.  Was upgraded to a larger room which gave us a second bedroom with two double beds as well as the two double beds in the main room....was nice to have room to spread out after long, tiring days.  Standard continental breakfast, friendly staff.    Like the last stay, washcloths are an issue....we had five people in the room but consistently had to ask for washcloths because only two were left in the room after maid service.   Air conditioner was also consistently turned off by maids.  This happened during the 2016 stay as well.   It was okay this time because the air at the end of June was rather cool, but would not be
Manager Response: Dear ngachick,  Thank you very much for the detailed review. We sincerely apologize for the less than perfect experience. We are glad that we were able to offer you the upgrades. Our goal is to always provide all our customers with the very best of service and experience. Your feedback helps us identify our strengths and weaknesses. We sincerely look forward to having you stay with us in the not too distant future. Have a wonderful weekend!

Summary: For the price I have to say this offered us very good value.  As have two teenage children needed two bedroom suite and this was one of the few hotels in the area which could offer this - only downside is one bathroom shared by both bedrooms.  The level of facilities offered very good - hairdryer, breakfasting table (only three chairs), fridge, microwave, coffee machine, iron and ironing board, safe.  Free wiifi and parking. Breakfast items are available from the office - pre-packed pastries and muffins with thermos of coffee - included in the price.  Some reviewers have complained of traffic noise but have to say we didn't notice it and our room was the nearest to the road.  Maid service everyday with clean towels and free toiletries.   Only 10-15mins walk from the Disney
Manager Response: Dear StKittsUk,  We are delighted that we were able to meet all your expectations. Thank you for letting us know. This also helps our future potential customers make an informed decision. We look forward to having you stay with us on your next visit to Disneyland. Have a wonderful weekend!

Summary: We enjoyed our week spent here.  Clean rooms.But our major complaint about the hotel is parking.  My daughter is handicapped, and could not walk to Disneyland and back every day, so we had a car and would drive to the park.  When we returned every night we had to struggle to find parking.  Very little parking for the number of rooms.  But that wasnt the worst of it.  The parking spaces are TINY!  Almost every vehicle in the parking lot were HUGE trucks, vans or SUV's.  Numerous times it was tricky to get in and out of our vehicle, because it was such a tight fit.  One other thing that was a little bit annoying.  On our last night, the rest of my party decided to go to Downtown Disney for a bit.  I stayed at the hotel to pack.  I wanted to turn on the TV, but couldnt.  When I
Manager Response: Dear KellieS,  Thank you for your review. Your experience helps us better understand our strengths and areas that need improvement. We discuss all feedback during our meetings. We hope you would consider us for your next trip to Anaheim. Have a great day!

Summary Heading: Good Location, Easy Walk to Disney, Free Breakfast & Parking
Summary: This motel-style property was pretty much all I needed as I was spending each waking hour at Disney.  The check-in process went smoothly, I got there earlier than check-in time and my room was available and they let me park the car (for free) early.  The room was fine – nothing special, two beds, a small sitting area, desk, tv, dresser, fridge, and microwave.  The bathroom had a tub, a huge mirror, and sink with extra space to put all your toiletries.  When I arrived, there was no shower curtain or towels in the bathroom.  I went to the front desk on my way to Disney and they told me that they use fabric shower curtains and like to wash them regularly.  That’s either a good sign, or at least a good lie. By the time I returned that night, the bathroom was as it should be.  The
Manager Response: Dear MySobriquet,  Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your stay. We really appreciate the comments and views. It helps us improve our product and service. Have a fantastic day!

Summary: First time staying at this hotel great staff and felt welcomed as soon as we walk into office to check in will definitely b coming back here in the future the handicap rooms n restroom in room are big n better then others at the bigger hotels around Disneyland exceptional highly recommend for handicap family thank you from the Juarez/Flores family
Manager Response: Dear Andre C,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are extremely glad that you had a wonderful experience with us. We hope to see you soon on your next Disney adventure.

Summary: This is my second time booking a room at the Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites and just like the first time it was a wonderful experience.  Room as clean and staff was very nice.  I love the way I am treated at this hotel, they do a great job of making me and my family feel welcomed.  They are very accommodating and friendly.  I will always book at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing your stay. We are thrilled that you had great service. Thank you again. Hope to see you soon on your next adventure!

Summary: Enjoyed our stay at this nice, quiet, clean hotel.  Within walking distance of Disneyland,  but the shuttle stop is right out front. Continental breakfast was good. Our only issue was housekeeping not bringing us clean towels.  They kept saying they didn't have any clean towels and would bring us back some. At least the front desk was close to go grab some later. We'd stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind words! As much as you loved staying here we loved having you here as our guests. Thank you again for taking the time to write about us. We look forward to seeing you here on your next adventure!

Summary: We were treated like family from beginning to end! The staff was very helpful and accommodating. Room & sheets were fresh, clean and quite modern! Location was so convenient. I suggest walking to Disney, only 15 minutes. From Disney, shuttle #7 stops first at Islander Inn & Suites. Unlimited bus pass ride may be purchased at the front desk for less cost. Will definitely recommend to family and friends!  - Anna R.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your complimentary words for our staff, they were very happy to read your comments. We're glad that you loved your room as well as our location. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.

Summary: The staff was super friendly, the rooms were in great condition, the pool was heated, you can see the fireworks from the hotel and they let me keep my car there the next day while I was at Disneyland.  I will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Kimberly K,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay. We are glad you had an excellent stay with us with great memories. We look forward to having you here on your next Disney adventure!

Summary: Within a mile of Disneyland, hotels are very pricey. This no-frills motel is terrific value. Great folks at the front desk, friendly and helpful, and very kind. I was very early and did not expect to get into my room. But it was ready, and the attitude at the desk was "this is not a difficulty".
