Two double beds (possibly queens, though I did not pay attention), microwave, refrigerator, large closet. About a 20-minute walk into Disneyland, so you can also avoid the chaos of amusement park garages.  I'll certainly stay there again if I need to spend a night in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear ByllD,  We love going the extra mile to give the best possible service to all our customers. Thank you acknowledging! We really appreciate it. Please do come stay with us on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Our family just spent 8 nights at the Islander and overall it was good. There were 6 of us total and it was really nice to have our own attached bedroom. The cleaning staff was excellent as there were several days we left the room a mess only to come back to a very clean room. The hotel is a 10 minute walk to the Disney gate and there are 5 car rental businesses in walking distance.   The only negative comment is the included breakfast. It consists of sugary pastries, twinkies, pre-packaged muffins, and bowls of bananas and apples. This is definitely not what Canadians expect at hotel breakfasts. For a family of 6 we expected this as a cost saving measure which didn't work out. The room also had a musty smell but after a few days of the fan on we either got used to it or the
Manager Response: Dear chadfournier,  Thank you for your response. We sincerely apologize for not being able to address all your issues. Your comments and suggestions are most welcome and will be reviewed carefully. We look forward to having you all stay with us again.

Summary: This smaller property is clean, quiet and in close proximity to the parks (10 minute walk to the main gates).  There are only two floors which boasts decent sized rooms with a variety of reasonably priced accommodation options to suit travellers' needs.  Any requests that I had were dealt with immediately.  The continental breakfast includes danishes, fruit, coffee and juice - this is a nice touch to the competitive room rates for the area.    The Anaheim Garden Walk is directly across the street along with numerous eateries and stores for sundries all within a block.  I certainly appreciated the post trip email I received from the property asking me if my expectations were met - I think this is a top notch customer service follow-up that is so rare in today's market.
Manager Response: Dear Moms-The-Word,  Many thanks for the detailed review. You are a top notch customer for doing so.  . We would love to have stay with us on your next Disney adventure!

Summary: The Hotel was perfect for our stay!   The location was great, walking distance to the Disney Parks, and all restaurants and stores right out our door.  The free parking was a bonus that we really appreciated!  The room was clean, comfortable and quiet.  The staff was very friendly.  I could not ask for a better place to stay for our family of five for that great price.  I would definitely stay there again, and will recommend to all my family and friends that are traveling to the LA area.  Thanks for making our stay fabulous!
Manager Response: Dear jachay2018,  We are extremely thrilled that you had a fabulous experience with us. Your response is much appreciated! Thank you for recommending us to your family and friends. We will take great care of them.

Summary: I go to Anaheim every year for the Natural Products Expo West, and finding any hotel room at all within walking distance of the Convention Center, much less a pleasant one at a decent price, is nearly impossible. Last year's choice was dismal -- musty, dated, and ill-kept -- and this year I had failed completely. So a few days before the convention, I called around looking for cancellations, without much hope. I did find a room at the Sheraton -- for over $600 a night... and then I found a room at the Islander, for $200! I was expecting very little, and just hoping it would be at least clean and not too shabby. What I found was a scrupulously kept, nicely decorated (totally 60s decor), wonderfully quiet establishment, with employees who were incredibly pleasant and helpful. And
Manager Response: Dear Neil Z,  Thanks a lot for the wonderful review. This makes as very happy. It’s great to be acknowledged. We put in a lot of effort to ensure that all our customers receive the best of service and value throughout their stay. We look forward to having you here next year!

Summary Heading: Good Hotel For Visit To Disneyland
Summary: The room was nice. Clean. Updated recently. No problems. Hotel was quiet which is good when trying to sleep for the day before Disneyland and after a day spent at Disneyland. No elevator in the hotel, so if a 2nd floor is problem for you and lifting luggage up the stairs, you might want to consider a 1st floor room. Especially if you are elderly and can not carry heavy luggage up stairs. The room has a safe to put your valuables. Parking is not a problem. Plenty of parking spaces when we went on March 12th thru March 15th. The breakfast is fruit (apples and bananas), pastries and coffee. Walking distance to Disneyland is about 10 to 15 minutes. CVS and Walgreens along with Starbucks Coffee is close by at about 2-5 minutes away.
Manager Response: Dear CSULBgraduate,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. Your descriptions and information are very valuable and helps future potential guests make informed decisions. I always recommend upstairs rooms for light sleepers and customers who have issues with using the stairs. Thank you again!

Summary: My husband and I needed to find affordable accommodations for a group of 18... we brought our entire family to Disneyland to celebrate our 40th Anniversary.  The Anaheim Islander is one of the few places that has rooms for larger families at a great price.  The rooms were clean and quiet. The front desk was always helpful. An added bonus was being able to catch the ARTs bus right in front of the hotel.  The Anaheim Islander is only a few blocks away from Disney and within easy walking distance,  However,  we had small children and planned on staying later in the park, so the bus was great for pick up and drop off. We had stayed here in previous years, but the updates have made it even more attractive.  We will stay here anytime we come to Anaheim.  I do not hesitate to recommend
Manager Response: Dear mickielmer,  Thanks for the fantastic review! We sincerely appreciate your time. Thank you for noticing the minor updates and giving some great pointers. We thrilled that you had a wonderful experience with us and look forward to having you here soon.

Summary: There are lots of hotels or inns near the Disneyland. Islander provide a good location and reasonable price for us to stay. The room is tidy and spacious. Starbucks, Walgreens, and IHOP are also nearby which only took within 3 minutes walk. Overall it was perfect. We'll definitely choose here when we visited Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Livia C,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are glad you had a wonderful experience with us. See you all soon on your next Disney vacation!

Summary Heading: Great location. Clean room. Good price. I will stay here every time I am in Anaheim
Summary: Great location. Clean room. Good price. I will stay here every time I am in Anaheim. Staff was friendly. Low key setting. Very good dining on the same block. Brief walk to Disney. Free parking to boot!
Manager Response: Dear Clifford M,  Thank you for the five star rating. We love having repeat guests. You guys are awesome! Have a wonderful weekend!

Summary: We are AP holders for Disneyland do travel to Anaheim several times per year. The Anaheim Islander inn is our favorite place to stay. It is conveniently located , the rooms are VERY reasonably priced, and always very clean.  The staff has always been very pleasant and accommodating.  It is really small so your from your car to your room in a minutes time!
Manager Response: Dear beachdremr,  Thank you very much for your feedback! Yes we do have discounts for Annual Pass holders when they book directly on our website. Hope to see you all again on your next Disney adventure!

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay!  We couldn’t believe the value of staying at this hotel, with just a 20 minute walk to Disneyland (and so many restaurants nearby)!!  The room was clean (including the bathroom), and our girls loved the bunk beds.  The free parking spot is what really bumped them ahead of the competition when we were looking for the hotel for our trip, and they were one of the few to offer a military discount, which also made us want to choose this hotel (it’s nice to feel appreciated)!  We will definitely be recommending Anaheim Islander Inn & Suites to our friends!  I gave four stars instead of five for two reasons:  1. The free breakfast was packaged muffins and danishes. Definitely better than nothing, but you generally think of more, so it caught us a little
Manager Response: Dear Erin P,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. Your comments and suggestions are very valuable to us to help improve our service. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed for four nights. It was our first time staying here. The stay was all good, from the friendly people in the office to the clean rooms and the price. It was an easy walk to Disneyland. Our son and daughter in law ended up getting a room here as well due to the fact that the room they had booked at the Portofino for the same time frame was filthy to say the least. They were very happy with the Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites. As a matter of fact I just booked another stay :)
Manager Response: Dear barefootbeachnana,  You guys are awesome! Thanks a lot for taking the time to review your stay. We very much enjoyed having you all here as well. Hope to see you soon. Have a wonderful long weekend!

Summary: I was here last time about 5 years ago.  Due to a big music trade show in town, this was the only hotel that I could book last minute at a decent price.  This year, I was back for the same show and again, this hotel was available.  I booked it again for two nights at a very reasonable price.  I had a good stay last time so I figured it would be the same.  It was a very good stay.  It looked like they have upgraded a bit since the last time I stayed here.  The room was decent.  The floors looked like it could use a bit of vacuuming or deep carpet cleaning, but since I only stayed here just to sleep pretty much, I wasn't all that picky.  The best thing about the hotel was the location.  The show as held in the Anaheim Convention Center and it was just a 10 minute walk, if that.
Manager Response: Dear kwondogg,  Thank you for your detailed review. Your comments and suggestions are very valuable to us. We are glad you had a great stay and look forward to having you here on your next trip to Anaheim. Thank you again!

Summary: We had a great stay recently for 5 nights. We stayed in the 4 Queen bed suite and it was perfect. There was 4 friends all with own bed.   Place is very clean and great walking distance to Disneyland.   I think a soft refurb (quilt covers, carpet and pillows) but otherwise great.   The breakfast was coffee, tea and some danishes in the front reception, not a big sit down breakfast I was expecting but enough to keep u full to lunch.  I would definitely recommend to families and friends travelling.
Manager Response: Dear  TahneeH82,  Thanks a lot for your review and recommendations. We are glad you enjoyed your stay here with us. Have a wonderful 2018!

Summary: I recently stayed there with friends in a 2 bedroom (4 queen beds) family room for 5 nights.  We were comfortable, the rooms were large, the bathroom small but manageable.  The amenities in the room was a bar size fridge, filter coffee machine (no kettle), TVs, there were plastic cups but no crockery.  I would recommend you ask for a room on the top level (only 2 levels) we had a family move in above our rooms and you can hear every single footstep not so good at 1am in the morning when you are trying to sleep.  The breakfast isn't really a breakfast, it's just pastries and coffee/tea set up in the reception area, it's not sit down buffet as you might expect.  Overall I would recommend Anaheim Islander Inn and Suites for short stays.
Manager Response: Dear Larissa F,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We recommend the upstairs rooms for longer stays and light sleepers. Thank you for the recommendations. Have a great year!

Summary Heading: BEST PLACE TO STAY IN DISNEY AREA!
Summary: Our family flew from New Zealand and stayed here for 18 nights. We had a party of 12.  Everything was on point! Lovely and friendly staff from the owners to the maids. We had trouble with our credit cards upon arriving being from NZ - the staff allowed us to just check in and sort it out in our rooms. Thank you :)  The rooms are HUGE and CLEAN! I have stayed in many hotels around the Disney area and these are the biggest rooms I have stayed in. Rooms were cleaned every day to a good standard - although at times we took our time to go out for the day, we always came back to nice smelling clean rooms.  Best location when going to Disneyland -15min walk to Disneyland. CVS, Walgreens, 7/11 are literally down the road (2/3 min walk). Also across the road from the Anaheim Gardenwalk,
Manager Response: Dear ksleilua87,  Thank you for the excellent review. We are very thankful for your time. Hope you all had a wonderful flight back to New Zealand. Have a fantastic 2018! Hope to see you all again in the near future!

Summary: This is my go to spot when going to Disneyland.  The room choices are excellent.  Whether its just my family of four or my family with my extended family there is always a room size perfect for us all. My favorite is the kid suites with the bunk beds.  The rooms and property itself is always clean.  The staff is very friendly.  The simple continental breakfast is good enough to get me through the morning, and the ART bus shuttle to the park is conveniently located right in front of the hotel and the front desk selling the tickets makes it easier!  There are times I have came in a little earlier then check in time and they have always allowed me to check in if the room was available which is a small thing but big to me!
Manager Response: Dear isacruz78,  Thank you very much for your feedback! We extremely glad that you had a fantastic experience. We look forward to having you and your family with us in the near future.

Summary: Clean rooms, nice personal, basic service, average hotel, good for the price, comfortable beds. excellent to rest rest after walking in Disney, the only thing is a funny smell in the room, nothing serious. I'll come back.
Manager Response: Dear by akira212018,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. Your feed back is very valuable to us and helps us make improvements. We hope to see you soon. Have a wonderful 2018!

Summary: My family and I enjoyed our stay at the Aneheim Islander Inn and Suites. What we loved most was how they took the time to arrange the stuffed animals my kids brought. The hotel itself was pleasant and clean. Parking was good and the service was excellent. I will definitely stay the next time I'm in town.
Manager Response: Dear Louize S,  Thank you for mentioning the little things. House keeping will be thrilled that there gestures don't go unnoticed. We look forward to having you back soon. Happy Holidays!

Summary: As we were planning our first family Disneyland vacation my husband came across the "Islander Inn and Suites". He gave me the total and I said, book it!!! Comparing the prices in that area. We arrive to this clean, fantastic smelling lobby(lol) only to be greeted by the most helpful staff!! It comes with a fridge, microwave, and a blow dryer, 15 min walk to disneyland!! My son thought he had left his atuotopia driver license in the room. So I called the hotel, they looked for it and got back to us promptly! Until next time 🙋
Manager Response: Dear Pati V,  Thanks for taking the time to let us know about your stay. We are glad you had a great experience! Glad we could be of assistance. Have a fantastic new year!

Summary: My sister and I recently spent a night and the staff was great.  They were very helpful, polite and accommodating. Although we had checked out they let us leave our car in their parking lot for the day while we went to Disneyland.  Wonderful holiday spirit!! We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear staceyttd,  We are extremely glad we could be of service to you during your stay. Happy holidays to you all. We look forward to seeing you here soon.

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay at this cozy hotel...
Summary: My family and I had a wonderful stay at this little hotel/motel. The staff were very nice & friendly. SHOUT OUT TO YOU EMMRET?!? I apologize if I misspelled your name:0).The room was CLEAN and so was the fridge & microwave. It was so great to have a fridge where we kept our snacks cold BONUS!!! They have a pool so my son spent a couple of hours splashing around.  The walk to Disneyland was about 10 -15 minutes maybe slower at night returning from the park. Yes, there was a screaming child but it lasted for 5 minutes I expect stuff like that to happen b/c they're kids. Every hotel/motel I've stayed in that has happened even at big chain beginning with H and ending with T. There is a 7/11,CVS,Walgreens all at the corners for late night snack runs. They have either direct tv or
Manager Response: Dear mikeysmommy07,  Thank you for the fantastic review! Detailed, helpful and fun to read! We are all thrilled. Thank you for supporting the little guy :). We look forward to having you all here soon. Happy holidays and have a wonderful new year!

Summary: We found this accommodation to be very good. They have reasonably sized rooms. Clean, we had room 228, wifi worked really fast although I did hear a lady say they couldn't get wifi in there room but we didn't have a problem. Office staff friendly and accommodating. Great showers, 15 to 20 min walk to Disneyland. Breakfast provided, pastries, tea, coffee.
Manager Response: Dear Lois P,  Thanks for taking the time to write about your stay. We are glad you had a great experience with our free Wifi. We recently updated our hardware. We look forward to seeing you and your family soon on your next Disney adventure!

Summary: Stayed here for our weekend Disneyland trip mostly because it was a decent walking distance from the park. We stayed in suite that had 2 beds in one room and one bed in the other, but only one bathroom. Besides the bathroom, there was no other mirrors in the rokm. That wasn’t very convenient since there was 3 of us women who needed to get ready. Not that big a of a deal to some people though. Besides that, the hotel was really clean when we arrived and the staff was super nice and helpful. Only about a 10 minute walk from Disney so I️ would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear danicadorado,  Thank you for staying with us on your Disney adventure. We usually do have a second mirror outside the bathroom. We sincerely apologies that your room did not have one. Have a wonderful holiday season.

Summary: This place is awesome. Close to Disneyland, friendly, clean and very reasonably priced.  It was a real find for us.  I expected an average experience but was overwhelmed wIith the service, understanding and meeting our requirements.  I felt like we were at home rather than staying in paid accommodation. The room was great, parking was good and the owners very flexible as our flight departed late at night.  They did everything to accommodate us.  I can't understand why anyone could not enjoy this hotel which is a very short walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: TravelQueenAkl,  Thank you very much for the overwhelmingly kind words. We a are blown away! We are glad we were able to go the extra mile in making your stay a great one. Happy holidays to you and your family.

Summary: This hotel is great! Literally catty-cornered across the street from Disneyland. Smaller hotel (maybe 36-40 rooms) but very clean, secure, and accommodating.  Staff is friendly and helpful. Real 2 bedroom suites with ample room for family get-a-ways.  A very relaxing stay. I have stayed here several times now and will again next trip to Disneyland.  Have referred family and friends to this place and will continue.  David, Texas
Manager Response: Dear David,  Hope all is well with you and your family. We really appreciate your business. Thank you very much for referring us to your friends and family. We were glad you enjoyed our friendly hospitality. We look forward to seeing you all here soon on your next Disney vacation.

Summary: Here's my experience and opinion on this location.  The room was clean, staff was friendly and it's about 3/4 mile walk to Disneyland entrance.  The room we had (standard 2 queens) came with a microwave and fridge. For my family though,  the Islander is just not worth the price.  This is a motel; it's loud with budget beds.  Thin bedding, mattress and pillows were not comfortable.  Motel atmosphere: loud.  Car alarms going off repeatedly, people vaping out on the walkway outside the rooms at night.    I've stayed at the Red Lion and Hyatt and both are much quieter locations with more comfortable beds and pillows and cost is the same as this place.  I went with the Islander this time because it advertised a continental breakfast and free parking which would add up to a savings
Manager Response: Dear ATravelingMama,  Thank you for taking the time to review our stay. We sincerely apologizes for the experience you had while you were here. Your concerns and suggestions will be reviewed. Have a fantastic day!

Summary: We had a large party we stayed in a 2 room suite perfect for us. Staff was very helpful room was clean. It is smaller motel but nice location to use transportation or walk to park. I would recommend this property
Manager Response: Dear Timbre L,  Thank you for recommending our property. Most of our customers are repeats and referrals. Happy holidays to you and your family!

Summary: This was our second time visiting the Anaheim Islander. And we had another great experience. On both occasions we rented the family Suite with two queen beds and bunk beds. This time our room included a couch which was great to be able to have something besides a bed to sit on. The room is super roomy and plenty of space for the six of us. During our time at the hotel we visited Disneyland which is about a 15-minute walk from the hotel. The beds are comfy, the pillows are comfy. The only two things that I would do anything different with would be the water pressure in the shower and the mini continental breakfast would be nice to have a few more options to choose from. But my son did enjoy the yummy lemon bars that were offered. Besides those two things that are totally easily
Manager Response: Dear faith6997,  Thanks for being a repeat customer. Your feedback is very important to us. Your concerns are noted. We are glad you had a great overall experience with us. Hope to see you soon on your next adventure!

Summary: Drove up from Fallbrook on a Friday to get up early for a Saturday in the Park. Overall, this was a great place to stay. my Wife and I stayed here with our 4 and 6 year old. We had plenty of room and the room was clean. I read the reviews about breakfast so actually brought it with us for Saturday (Mickey pancakes and blueberries) but, the coffee was good and if you like muffins and danish type grub your good. they had bananas and apples too so, brought those for snacks in the park. the walk to the park way maybe 15 minutes and if your cant walk that far get a scooter. On the Saturday, we came back for a nap and the people above us had 3-4 small children running around entire time and we herd everything. I told the front desk and did what they could. I wasnt happy about it but,
Manager Response: Dear Jon B,  Thank you for taking the time to detail your experience. Much appreciated! We Sorry about the experience with the sound upstairs. We really hope to see you soon for Christmas!

Summary Heading: Great location, friendly staff, great room.
Summary: We recently stayed at the Islander Inn in Sept. The room for 3 of us was large, clean, comfortable beds and quiet. The staff was very friendly and helpful. I'd stay at this hotel again and recommend it for my friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear leannedavis4,  Thank you for your recommendations. That means a lot us. Most of our quests comprise of repeat customers and referrals. Thank you again!

Summary: We recently (early Sept 17) stayed for 2 nights at the Islander Inn and Suites. We flew in early in the morning to LAX and drove out to Anaheim, arriving mid morning. The greeting from the manager was warm and welcoming and he very kindly gave us a early check in.  Our room was on the lower level.  Parking was in front of the room, easy to drive in and out. The first thing I noticed was how clean and well kept the hotel looked. Everything in the room was in very good condition. Comfortable beds, USB ports in the bedside lamps and cable TV with lots of channels. Fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Wifi was easy to connect to and fast. Spotless bathroom with shower over bathtub, nice soaps and shampoo and generous towels. Although W Katella is a busy road, we didnt notice any
Manager Response: Dear Terry00seven,  Thank you for supporting the little guy :) . Its a ton of competition in the Anaheim Resort area. We grateful that you picked us and had a great experience. Thank you for taking the time to review your stay in detail. This really helps future potential customers make informed decisions. We hope to see you in the near future. Have a wonderful rest of the year!

Summary: This hotel is everything you need to save your hard earned money for the Parks.  Very cost effective, clean rooms, comfortable beds, exceptionally friendly staff and even better is the fact that it is the first pickup, first drop off point for the shuttles!  Pool is refreshing after long day in the sun at the parks and is walking distance to great restaurants!    Would recommend this hotel without question
Manager Response: Dear M7968FFmichaelb,  Thank you for the wonderful review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us. For travelers on a budget you sure do get a lot from us. Thanks a lot for your confidence in us. We hope to see you soon on your next trip to Anaheim California.

Summary: We just returned from Anaheim, where we used this hotel as home base during our 5 days in Disneyland.  The main reason I chose this hotel was the price, which was very good.  I also insist on hotels within walking distance to the parks, which this one is.  The walk to DL was about 15 minutes or so, maybe a bit longer depending on your walking speed.  It's super close to The Garden Walk, where there are done great restaurants, and two pharmacies are right there, along with and convenience stores as well.  Our room was a decent size with 2 queen beds and a love seat. We had a safe, fridge, coffee maker and fridge.  The coffee was just terrible - in room and at the breakfast on site.  We ended up grabbing ours at the Starbucks on the way to DL.  The fridge was nice to have, but be
Manager Response: Dear Berniece2000,  Thank you for taking the time to review you stay in detail. This always helps us recognize our strengths and weaknesses to help better improve the overall service we provide. We do sincerely apologize for the inconveniences. Thanks for recommending us. We hope to see all here soon.

Summary: The Islander is a great value. The room was large and comfortable and had a small fridge and a microwave. The pool was small but like everything else spotlessly clean. The staff was all very friendly and helpful. The parking was free but a little tight. There are many restaurants within easy walking distance. Disneyland is 0.8 miles and there is an attractions bus stop very close.
Manager Response: Dear Paul O,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are glad you enjoyed our customer service. We try our best to provide the best for all our guests. Our proximity to the main gates is another plus which is around a 15 minute walk or the ART stops right in front of our hotel for more convenient access for a nominal fee. Thank you again for staying with us. Best Regards.

Summary: We had a family of 6 and reserved a great suite at the last minute to our surprise.  We had a late arrival and parking was still available.  Rooms were very comfy with all the amenities  that was expected.  Very short walking distance to a large variety of restaurants, whether it was fast food or eat ins.  Enjoyable walk to Disney.  Staff was friendly and attentive.  Continental breakfast was just enough to get us going.  However, I do recommend that small bottles of juice were available for those who don't drink coffee. Fruits and Danish were very fresh each morning.  Coffee was great tasting!  Will I stay again, ABSOLUTELY......
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. Its great that you guys had a wonderful experience. Thank you for the kind words. See you all soon on your next adventure!

Summary: We happened upon this property for our recent stay in Anaheim, sort of by accident. After reading the online reviews we decided to give it a try and we are glad we did.  For starters, this hotel is a small family run operation (which we like) and the staff were gracious, friendly and helpful.  Our room was very adequate, the free wifi was good, there's no additional charge for parking and the price was right!  The pool area is also nice and the property is only about a 15 minute walk to Disneyland.  The only slight downside was the selection of breakfast items which was quite limited.  All in all it was a very pleasant stay!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your feedback. We are thrilled that everything worked out for you. Your feed back is very important too us. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: This was a great place to stay! Walking distance to Disneyland and plenty of places to eat. Staff was extremely pleasant and helpful. I will definitely stay here again. There was one little bug that appeared the first night. He got away and didn't reappear until our last night there. Don't worry, he didn't get away the second time so he won't be bothering any other guests.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for dealing with the bug :) We are glad you enjoyed your stay and look forward to seeing you all here soon.

Summary: Stayed in a two-room suite and found it to be clean, roomy and stocked with the amenities such as coffee pot, refrigerator, TV's, comfy beds and good air conditioning! We enjoyed our stay and will definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Axel A,  The two room suite is pretty spacious. Especially the suite that comes with four queen beds which sleeps up to eight individuals. Its a great way to budget your stay if you have a large family. We hope to see you soon on your next Disney adventure!

Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights with the family.  Rooms are clean and comfy, staff is very nice and friendly and within easy walking distance to Disneyland and the convention center.  If you want a fancy hotel with tons of amenities this is not the place for you.  It is however a nice little gem for a reasonable price.  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear annieokli,  We loved having you all here as our guests. The walk to the convention center and Disneyland take about 10 to 15 minutes depending on pace. Thank you for staying with us for four nights. Take care and have a wonderful day!

Summary: free parking, close to disneyland , 20 minute walk one way or you can catch the art bus which stops in front the hotel. We used lyft and uber to the parks and it was around 7 dollars one way Had a 2 queen bed and pull out sofa room for 2 adults and 3 teen age kids. alot of places to eat within walking distance. Convention center is a short 10 minute walk away. Would recommend if going to disney or the convention center. Breakfast is grab and go or take back to your room and eat.
Manager Response: Dear Perrymahoe,  Yes, we are conveniently located to both the Anaheim convention center and Disneyland. Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We sincerely appreciate your time. Have a wonderful rest of the year!

Summary: We booked  a two bedroom suite for my family and another family.  It was clean and the staff was polite and knowledgeable. Good water pressure!   Walkable to Disneyland. The two room suite was very nice.  WIFI was ok
Manager Response: Dear Victoria C,  We are glad you enjoyed your stay and had a great experience with us. Please spread the word and we hope to see you all soon.

Summary: My husband and 3 kids stayed here from 6/11/17 - 6/16/17.  We had a 2 room suite - 2 bed in the room when you first walk in and then another bed in the other room. Jack & Jill bathroom. The bathroom was small and tight, but it served its purpose. The hotel itself is a small location, but well kept.  The rooms were clean, and larger than I had anticipated. Beds were comfortable for the most part. TV in each room. Mini Fridge and Microwave are in the bedroom with one bed. Desk in one room and table/chairs in the other room. The area is quiet, we had no real issues, however, we were on the upstairs.  Quick 15min walk to Disneyland, shaded for the most part and safe walk. The staff at the hotel were helpful, I lost a room key and they replaced it no questions asked. IHop is 5min
Manager Response: Dear Lori M,  It was wonderful having you guys here as our guest. We are thrilled that your overall experience was wonderful. Our central location is very appealing to most of our guests.  Thank you again for your feedback. I will pass it on to all the staff. This really helps us improve our service. We really look forward to having you here on our next adventure!

Summary: Third time to Disneyland, 2nd time staying here. We checked in SUPER late. We had a 2 bedroom suite with 4 queen beds, bottom floor. The room is a bit dated & smelled a bit funky. But, when you're tired, those minor things can be overlooked. My family & i LIKE the "home" feel of this place. The fact that we can go in & out freely & so conveniently rather than riding down an elevator & out to the car was a plus for us. It's literally a hop skip & jump to Starbucks, Walgreens (24hrs) & CVS in case you forget something. It's also a short walk to the Anaheim Gardenwalk where there's a lot of restaurants & shops. Bubba Gumps, McCormick's, The Cheesecake Factory, etc. It's also maybe 20 minute walk to Disneyland & California Adventure Park but my family did the City Pass, HIGHLY
Manager Response: Dear Correa808,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. This always helps us better our service by recognizing our strengths and weaknesses. We our extremely glad to hear that you will be back again in 2018! Have a wonderful rest of the year.

Summary: My wife, twin daughters, sister in law and mother in law all stayed in a suite.  There were 2 beds in 1 room and 1 bed in the other.  A jack & Jill bathroom accommodated us.  With 5 women all vying for a single bathroom...    The stay was quite pleasant.  The walk to Disneyland took us 15 minutes or so.  It was close enough that I would walk back and take a nap and then return to the park.  The rooms were clean and the staff was friendly.  The property felt very safe and was quiet (note: Anaheim does have a little bit of a homeless population around Disneyland and the Angel's stadium).  The rates were very reasonable and we will definitely return and stay.  There is a Walgreens next door and plenty of places to eat within eyesight.
Manager Response: Dear baileybd,  Thank your fro taking the time to review your stay. We are glad you had a pleasant experience. We hope to see you back soon. Have a great summer!

Summary: We stayed here for 8 days and found this a great place for visiting Disneyland. It's located within easy walking distance or shuttle bus right outside gate. Rooms are good, practical,roomy and very clean. Microwave,fridge and tea/coffee facilities available. Front desk is very helpful and Disney tickets,tours and airport shuttles can be booked here with no trouble doing so. Plenty of parking outside rooms and a good size pool available. Laundry facilities are also available. Good shops all around motel with all needs covered. Motel provides a very basic grab and go breakfast but good breakfasts available near by.
Manager Response: Thank you for all the kind words. We really enjoyed having you folks here as our guest. It’s great to hear form our customers that we are doing a wonderful job. It’s a fantastic motivator to all our staff. We hope to see you here soon on your next adventure! Best Regards to you from all of us here at the islander.

Summary: This was our first official Disneyland vacation. Our group was a total of 13 people ranging from 2.5 yrs to 54 yrs old. We did a lot of research before finally settling for the Anaheim Islander Inn and it was the BEST decision! The rooms are very roomy and clean. Parking is free which was a great plus! We got to leave the cars and go to Disneyland since our rooms weren't ready yet. We stayed in the 2 queen beds with bunk beds and the 2 queen beds with sofa bed. The staff is very helpful and polite. We will definitely be coming back here next year!!!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your kind and supportive words. We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to review us.

Summary: Hotel was very clean and the front desk service was excellent! We stayed in the room with two queen beds and a bunk bed, my family of 6 fit comfortably and the kids were thrilled to sleep in the bunk beds. It was an easy walk to Disneyland and on the night our legs were too tired we simply took an Uber which only cost $5. Perfect hotel, we will be returning many times to use our Annual Passes!
Manager Response: Your complete satisfaction means a lot to us. Our staff really enjoyed having you as our guest. We would love to have you back on your next vacation. Have a great rest of the year and we hope all is well.

Summary: Awesome hotel!! Great location, excellent price, superior customer service!! Dilip was so kind and went above and beyond to insure our stay was excellent!! Spacious 2 bedroom suite , and they provided a crib for our baby at a minimal charge. Clean and overall just impressive. We will only stay here from now on!
Manager Response: Thank you for all the kind words. We really enjoyed having you folks here as our guest. It’s great to hear form our customers that we are doing a wonderful job. It’s a fantastic motivator to all our staff. We hope to see you here soon on your next adventure! Best Regards to you from all of us here at the islander.

Summary: So they say it's only a block to Disneyland. This is misleading. It is only a block to parking. It is closer to a mile to Disneyland from this hotel. The floors of the room seemed wet as well, and that was a little odd. It was like a just shampooed floor, but the bottom of our socks were black from walking on the floors. Pretty gross!  That being said, the people who work here are super friendly! The room was cozy and the beds were pretty comfortable. It is a very quiet hotel, at least during this time - and it was completely full.   The walk was long and tiring after walking around Disneyland for the whole day. However, it is near a lot of restaurants and shopping. Bubba Gumps is across the street - as well as PF Changs. About a block or so is Walgreens. A little further down
Manager Response: We are constantly striving to offer better value for all our customers. The carpeting throughout the entire hotel was just replaced a few months ago and so was the parking lot tarmac. As you mentioned this may have been the result of the black left on your socks.Located about a block and a half away takes about 10 to 15 minutes to walk depending on your pace. It is a very manageable distance for the vast majority.. Thank you for talking the time to write to us

Summary: A nice clean hotel. Staff was very nice. It is a motel so you need to be prepared for some outside noise, but not bad. A nice walk to Disneyland and a lot of services nearby. The two bedrooms was perfect. My own personal issue is the added "Resort Fee". This really is a hidden room charge and this was not a resort. All and all good for families.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write to us. We sincerely do apologize for the misunderstanding and are currently looking in to it. We always try to provide the best service possible by providing the room type reserved or an upgrade whenever possible. We thank you again for staying with us and hope to see you here soon.

Summary: Three of us adults visited this motel for 8 nights from Jan 28 to Feb 5, 2017. It was a great place to stay. The breakfast is juice, coffee and hot chocolate plus danish, packaged muffins, apples and bananas which is enough for something quick when we were busy and out the door . The staff was great and helpful.The room was quiet and away from the street.For the price you couldnt ask for more. I will return here when i visit again. It is close to restaurants, garden walk and drug stores.It is a 15 minute walk to Disney. Thank you to this wonderful place!
Manager Response: Thank you for all the kind words. We really enjoyed having you folks here as our guest. It’s great to hear form our customers that we are doing a wonderful job. It’s a fantastic motivator to all our staff. We hope to see you here soon on your next adventure! Best Regards to you from all of us here at the islander.

Summary: This was a hidden gem about a 20 minute walk from Disneyland main gat and the Anaheim convention center.    Rooms were spotless, recently renovated and well appointed.  Refrigerator, Microwave, coffee maker - great beds and even nice pillows.   An outstanding find and a great price too.  You can also park there all day long for no charge.    Great WiFi and quick check in/out.
Manager Response: Thank you for all the kind words. We really enjoyed having you folks here as our guest. It’s great to hear form our customers that we are doing a wonderful job. It’s a fantastic motivator to all our staff. We hope to see you here soon on your next adventure! Best Regards to you from all of us here at the islander.

Summary: I had read other reviews making this my choice to stay, great location, very friendly staff, biggest room we have ever had, larger frig that most, walked to Disney. I could go on and on, we plan on returning to California for future trips, this will be our place to stay.  AJ in office was especially helpful with directions, traffic info, and general information.  Can't wait to come back and explore other areas in California.  Dave - Golden CO.
Manager Response: Dear Dave,  Thank you very much for the positive comments. We really enjoyed having you here with us. We look forward to serving you on your future California expeditions. Thank you again and have a great rest of the year.

Summary: Easy walk to Disney with tons of restaurants around. Friendly and helpful staff. Rooms are clean and the AC works great! The rooms look a little dated but are maintained and cleaned well. Great spot! Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear jemtravel22,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are glad you had a wonderful experience. We hope to see you all in the near future. Best Regards!

Summary: Perfect location to visit disney, very good attention, and you have a lot of options to eat near by. We arrived at night and had no problem with check in. I leave the charger of my cell phone and the hotel staff tale care to send it to me :)
Manager Response: Dear Yesterday,  Thank you for your review. There are many great places to eat around here and Disney is only a 10 minute walk. We are glad that we were able to send your charger. We loved having you all here and look forward to seeing you soon. Have a wonderful 2017!

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights and used it as a base to visit the Disney parks as well as Universal Studios. The staff were friendly, there is adequate parking onsite, there is also a laundry room which was really useful as we were halfway through a 2.5 week trip around California! The room we had was on the first floor, it was a lovely spacious room with very comfortable beds, there was plenty of room for a family of 4. The hotel offers breakfast which is served in the reception area and consists of juice, hot drinks, pastries and fruit, a perfectly good choice before heading out for the day!   The Disney parks are around a 10 minute walk away and so saves on paying for parking.  The swimming pool is lovely and refreshing and just what we needed after a busy day at Disney!! We
Manager Response: Dear Danielle W,  Thanks a lot for your recommendation. This means a lot! We are thrilled that you a wonderful stay with us and enjoyed California. Hope to see you all soon on your next adventure!

Summary: I found this place by chance. Its in a excellent location to Disneyland, stores, and restaurants! I love their choices of rooms. The 1st time we stayed we got a room with two rooms and three beds. So much room! This last time I got the kid suite which had two queen beds and a double/twin bunk and a sofa. All the rooms come with a fridge and microwave. Its very clean and I love they always allow me to do early check in and late check out. Laundry room on site which is nice! Free parking! Staff is very friendly!
Manager Response: Dear isacruz78,  Thank you for taking the time to write to us. We have many different room types listed on our website to suit the biggest of families. Our staff is very flexible when it comes to special requests always going above and beyond to meet all our customers needs. Very glad you all enjoyed your stay. See you all soon. You guys are an incredible bunch!

Summary: Our situation: Our holiday group is a large family:  1 infant, 1 teenager, 4 fit adults, and two elderly travellers, one of whom requires a mobility scooter. It was a long, direct flight from Australia to LA, and we arrived at the Islander at about 9am.  The staff were extremely accommodating, allowing us to leave our (huge) luggage collection at reception until the room was ready, and they made a special effort to let us into our room a couple of hours earlier than the stated check-in time.  The room was clean, the beds were comfortable, and the baby-crib was sturdy and comfy for our son. The air-conditioning was efficient, and kept the temperature right where we wanted it.  The location is outstanding - a short walk to Disneyland, which was great, as we couldn't get the
Manager Response: Dear AmigoMarlz,  We are really flattered by you review. Thank you very much for detailing your experience here at the Islander. A vast majority of our guests come from Australia, Canada, England & New Zealand. We love helping our guests get the most out of their vacation. We look forward to having you here on your next Disney escape in a few years. Have a prosperous 2017!

Summary: Clean, well maintained room. For the value, well worth it. Hotel management ensures rooms meet customer expectations. Quality of amenities was within expectations. The double suite was of good quality
Manager Response: Dear anibalavaladas,  Our housekeeping staff are a brilliant team. They always seem to exceed our expectations as well. We are very fortunate. Thank you for the compliments will pass them along.  We look forward to seeing you all soon in 2017. Have great year full of fun and adventure!

Summary: This is a Great place to stay! It is Great location! We have three small children and we walked to the park (kids in the stroller).Great staff! Clean Rooms! We have stayed here a couple times and have always left happy!
Manager Response: Dear aliseperez76,  Thank you very much for your loyalty. Most of our guests are repeat customers. We love having our regulars here. Have a wonderful 2017!

Summary: Highly recommend.  Would stay their again. If you are traveling on a budget excellent place to stay. Clean. Nice people. Good service. The walk wasn't to bad to Disneyland. It was about 15 minutes. Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear Kathleen S,  Thank you for your confidence in and our service. We look forward to having you with us again this Year. Have a Fabulous 2017!

Summary: We've stayed here on two trips now.  For the money, it can't be beat.  It's a little bit of a haul back to the hotel each night with children after you've put in 8-10 miles but worth it.   It's no 5 star hotel but has everything you need to be comfortable and is usually a bargain.  It's clean, spacious, free parking, wifi, and within walking distance.    I gave it 5 stars as for the price, it's as 5 star as you will get.  We will stay there on future visits, no question.
Manager Response: We're thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. We're glad that you loved your room as well as our location. Thanks again, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon next time you visit the area.

Summary Heading: Perfect For a Trip to Disney!!
Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed at this hotel during our recent trip to Disneyland and it was a great stay!! The room was very clean and spacious for 2 people, might be a little tight for 4 people but definitely doable. You can't beat the distance, it took us roughly 15-20 minutes to walk to the entrance of disneyland and is located by many restaurants (Cheesecake factory, PF Changs, Bubba gumps all across the street) which was convenient! During our stay we didn't have to drive anywhere once! The only reason why I gave it 4 stars was due to the breakfast.... they only provided prepackaged muffins and bananas so we ended up having to eat out for breakfast because we wanted a filling breakfast so that we didn't have to eat at the park. Although we ended up spending more money on
Manager Response: Dear Nicole C,  Thanks for choosing the islander for your Disney vacation. We thrilled that you enjoyed your stay. Our housekeeping works really hard on maintaining the best rooms possible. They will be thrilled. We hope to see you  here soon on your next adventure!

Summary: Within a 15 minute walk to the Magic Kingdom, this is a great room to call home.  Our room gave us 3 queen beds so lots of room for the six of us.  The fridge came in handy.  There are a large number of great restaurants right across the street in a newly opened mall area.  The hotel is obviously well used but was extremely comfortable and the staff were amazingly accommodating.  I will return to stay here again in a heartbeat.  In our opinion, this is incredible value. If there is a drawback it is that there is but ONE bathroom but it works very well for a family group.  None of us had any complaints even after three nights so it really worked good for us.
Manager Response: Dear Larry D,  We are located not too far away from the Disney main gates. Around a 15 to 20 minute walk to the park. All our rooms come equipped with a microwave, fridge and coffee maker. Our family suites are very popular and spacious. We hope to see you soon on your next getaway!

Summary: Due to unforseen circumstances we needed to book a last minute one night stay here. The staff could not have been more accomodating and even allowed us to do an early check in. Awesome!  Room was great...clean, comfortable and spacious. Parking is a little tight and breakfast is lacking but not a deal breaker. Rooms have a fridge and microwave which really comes in handy for storing some snacks or if you want to make your own breakfast in your room. Walgreens is only a few minute walk away for picking up necessities and Disneyland was about 10-15 mins.  Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear N2dsney,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us on your last minute adventure. We are extremely glad that we were able to go the extra mile to accommodate your requests. We look forward to seeing you here on your next Disney get away!

Summary Heading: Great location and good size room
Summary: We visited for 7 nights in October and the location was great. We are a family of 6 with my kids aged 10,8,6 and 7 months. It was no troubles walking to and from Disneyland and we were close to cheesecake factory, bubba gump and walgreens etc.  We booked the 2 room family suite which had a queen bed in bedroom and then 2 doubles in the main room. One 2 way bathroom. It has a microwave but does not have a kettle or anything else. We needed the kettle to boil the baby's water and they did provide us with one. Beds were comfortable. My baby and I had trouble every night with being all blocked up and when my husband looked at the air conditioner the filters were filthy. A quick clean out by us and all good after that. This is a job they need to do constantly. Room and grounds of
Manager Response: Dear Davina H,  We loved having your entire family here as well. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We sincerely apologize about the air conditioner filters not being clean. Thank you for your comments and suggestions as well. We look forward to seeing you all here on your next Disney vacation.

Summary Heading: As strangers to Anaheim we were thrilled to be given good advice re: Disneyland and other attractions.
Summary: Our stay with the Anaheim Islander Inn started before we actually arrived there.  I received a prompt acknowledgement of my reservation following up with a reminder of the dates, etc. When we arrived there we were very impressed at the level of help and advice given us by the desk employee.  We were given the accommodation that we then asked for as we needed to be at ground level. During our stay there we were helped by a variety of desk helpers who were all doing all they could to make our trip memorable. The premises were very clean and well maintained.  Even the maids were very helpful. I had forgotten a personal item in the room and the management contacted me and quickly mailed the item to me.  That was outstanding!!
Manager Response: Dear j0vial1,  We humbled by your kind words. Thank you for making the time to review your stay. We hope to see you back on your next adventure!

Summary Heading: Great Hotel. Lousy TripAdvisor Software, I Hate Taking Orders From Computers.
Summary: Helpful staff, Large rooms. Very clean. Close to Disney. Limited breakfast choice but nice to be able to eat in the room; plenty of extra coffee. Now I'm adding extra rubbish because your software designer thinks I've got all day to waste writing reviews when, in fact, I have a life.
Manager Response: Dear priceb61,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We are glad that you had a great experience. Have a wonderful day!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Islander. We arrived early from Peru and were given an early check in with no problems. We enjoyed the simple but quite adequate breakfast (fruits, muffins and coffee/tea) each day before walking to Disneyland & California Adventure Park (15 min walking)
Manager Response: Dear coachingperu,  Hope the weather is great in Peru and you’re all safely back at home. We loved having you guys here. It was a genuine pleasure. We hope to see you soon on your next Disney adventure in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Excellent Value near Disneyland. Friendly Staff.
Summary: We stayed for 1 night on 28SEP2016. Heard about it through a colleague who previously stayed there and raved about it. He was right. The rates are excellent for the area, and it's only about a 7 minute walk to Disneyland. The staff and management are very friendly, the rooms were comfortable and clean and it's a quiet location. They offer a mini-fridge which was great for storing snacks. They also sell Disney tickets at the Front desk. Will definitely stay there again on our next visit!
Manager Response: Dear mce71,  Thanks for your loyalty. Word of mouth really helps. We try to maintain competitive rates. We are thrilled that you had a great experience. We hope to see you soon on your next adventure!

Summary: We stayed there for a few days on our trip to Disneyland. Rooms were very clean and the staff was very nice.  Nice 10 min walk to Disneyland.  Food places within walking distance. Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Loddee37,  Thank you for your review. Yes, they just opened a 24 hour Walgreen's next door. Subway & coffee bean is a 5 minute walk. Glad you enjoyed your stay. See you soon!

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at the Islander.  We arrived early from NZ and were given an early check in with no problems.  This was great as we could sleep.  We enjoyed the simple but quite adequate breakfast each day before walking to Disneyland & California Adventure Park.  This was not a long walk and we didn't need to use the shuttle at all.  The kids loved the pool.  We found the rooms clean and roomy enough for all our luggage.  The shower was great and air conditioning on hot days & nights good. We highly recommend this hotel to others as a great value for money choice.
Manager Response: Dear mcbrown2014,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your stay. Hope you guys are all settled in back at home in New Zealand. Your family was wonderful and we loved having you all here. We hope to see you all in the near future on your next escape to Disney!

Summary: Great place clean,friendly love the danishes in the A.M. clean pool very refreshing after spending 3 days in Disneyland!!! Great price especially being withen walking distance to Disneyland. The staff friendly and efficient maid service daily parking easy we were able to find a spot in front of our room daily making it easy to pack gear.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for the overwhelming positive review from your stay. We are absolutely thrilled that we got things perfect with you. We really enjoyed having you here as our guests and look forward to serving soon on your next escape to Disney!

Summary: I was pleased with this hotel when I booked it, because they offered two bedroom suites with three queen beds, which was a perfect setup for my brother, parents, and I. We stayed five nights, and we're pleased with our stay. The rooms are arranged around a courtyard with free parking, so there is very little street noise. There is a Walgreen's and CVS on the corner if you need to pick up any items you forgot.  The main gates to the parks are only a 15-20 minute walk. They also have a nice saltwater pool when you need to take a break from the parks and cool off. The staff was friendly and efficient during checkin and checkout. I would stay here again and recommend to friends and family!
Manager Response: Tristan K,   Thank you for your feedback. This is always a valuable tool for potential future guests. We really enjoyed having you all here. Thank you for recommending us to your friends and family.

Summary Heading: Another great visit at the Anaheim Islander
Summary: My husband & I chose to stay here again this Labor Day weekend. Our first stay was back in December (which I forgot to write a review for). Both stays were excellent. We choose Anaheim Islander because of the great price and it's proximity to Disneyland.We are the type of Disney vacationers that go to the park first thing in the morning, come back for a midday break, then stay until the parks close. How does Anaheim Islander relate to this? 1. Excellent value. Unless you're staying during a peak season, rooms average to $100 a night. If you are spending less on the hotel, you can spend more on churros,dole whips, and souvenirs. :) 2. There is a CVS and a Walgreens on the walk to Disneyland. This proved to be very helpful when walking to and from the parks, to pick up water
Manager Response: Dear Kelsey P,  Thank you for continuing to be a loyal customer. It is always a pleasure having you all here. Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed description of your stay. It is extremely informative, graphic and humorous at the same time :)  Happy holidays!

Summary: Was very impressed with the rooms, clean, comfortable, convenient to Disney.  We had 2 rooms, 1 with a suite as my grandson was with us.  It was close to restaurants & was a pleasure to be there 3 days.
Manager Response: Dear DeniseCHasley,  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay here with us. Our house keeping works really hard every day to maintain the highest level of cleanliness and comfort. Thank you for choosing the islander for your family vacation. Have a wonderful rest of the year!

Summary: Moved to California 6 months ago from UK and have stayed here 3 times and have booked again for November . This hotel is clean,convenient to shops ,reasonably priced eating places and also within walking distance to Disneyland parks .
Manager Response: Dear Yvonne W.  Thank you for being a loyal customer. We really appreciate it. Hope you are settling down well in Cali. Very much look forward to seeing you back in November.

Summary: We arrived in the middle of the night and were still able to check in.  Our room was upgraded from 2 queens and a sofa bed that I reserved to 2 queens, a sofa bed, and a bunk bed.  It was a great room for our family.  The beds were comfortable.  The room was kept immaculately clean by the housekeeping staff.  We were on the second floor and stepped could step outside our door to watch the nights we weren't at Disneyland. A quick walk to Disney.  We stayed there the third week of August.  We stayed for 6 nights, so the con I would say is that the breakfast was the exact same every single morning.  No variance.  Just pastry, pre packaged muffins, and fruit.  Would have been nice to change it up, or even add cereal to the mix.
Manager Response: Dear greggab2016,  Thank you for the review. Housekeeping staff will be thrilled! We are glad that we were able to offer you a complimentary upgrade. Your input and suggestions are very valuable to us. Thank you again for your time.

Summary: I grew up around Disney in the '60's and '70's and remember the way it was. Today, things are different, some for the better, some not so much so. Once, the park was surrounded by wonderful small hotels and motels, mostly family owned and operated, each with its own little theme and flavor but they all provided a wonderful place to stay and enjoy your vacation. Today, these have almost all disappeared being swallowed up by large corporate spots offering a room in a box. The Anaheim Inn and Suites continues to offer the best of the rest. It is a smaller place with a quiet and intimate feel. The rooms are clean and comfortable. There is a pool out front. Just a few minutes walk from the Disneyland, and close and convenient to everything Orange County has to offer, if you want an
Manager Response: Dear Californiac,  Wow! We are speechless. Thank you for the extremely kind words. That’s exactly what we were aiming for. We hope to continue this trend and service as long as we can. Keeping up with the big corporates is no easy task. Its customers like you who keep us going. Thank you for your loyalty and acknowledgements. This means a lot to us.

Summary: Let's get the cons out of the way: continental breakfast - not good - though they claim they have fruits on their website as an option, there is none; if you're on the 1st floor you will hear the footsteps from the walkway on 2nd floor at night - get earplugs; cleanliness failed ONLY that I found 2 hairs in the tub, but not horribly disgusting.  Keep reading if you want to hear the great stuff that kind of makes up for all of the above!  1) Room: The room was immaculate (with the one exception above)! We were in a 2 queen bdrm on 1st floor near the front and the beds were really comfortable. Couldn't hear the main street traffic; only the wonderful Disneyland fireworks that displayed for free from the parking lot! :-) 2) Staff: The staff was friendly and helpful (both on the
Manager Response: Dear Geesvee,  Thank you for taking the time to write about us. I’m sorry that you did not have any fruits available during breakfast. We usually have apples and bananas included along with muffins, Danishes, orange juice and fresh coffee. We try our very best to always offer the very best of service to all our guests at all times.  Sometimes we do fall short. I sincerely apologize on behalf of all our staff. We do look forward to having you back again as our guests on your next vacation.

Summary: For the price this is  great choice. It takes about 12 minutes to walk to the park and there are drug stores and small restaurants on along the way. The rooms are clean and offer a fridge and microwave. There is a small pool that is perfect for the kids to cool off in.  The management was very helpful. They allowed us to check in early and gave us a much larger room than we had booked. We were also able to park all day after check out. When we were leaving they opened a room so my daughter could go potty.  I would request an upstairs room. I was able to hear every step from the room above. The breakfast is not great. They offer bananas, appples, packaged muffins, OJ, and coffee.
Manager Response: Dear yosemiteali,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. The walk to Disney takes around 10 to 15 minutes depending on your pace. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay here with us. Upstairs rooms are usually recommended for very light sleepers. Hope to see you all here soon on your next vacation.

Summary Heading: Very clean and close to all convenience.
Summary: I was there with business partners for a convention from August 10 to 14th.  Very well maintained.  A/C worked very well. Maids were doing a great job. We asked to have more hanger (business convention) and we were served right away. As well when we left, they accommodated to look over our luggage and two other business partners from another inn while we went for lunch before grabbing our shuttle. The location is very conveninet.  Lots of restaurant all around. CVS 5 min walk from there. I would go there again.
Manager Response: Dear Hugo G,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay. We recently upgraded all our air conditioning units in anticipation of a hot summer. We are glad that you noticed and it made a difference. Have a great rest of the year!

Summary: Stayed here for a few nights while visiting Disneyland.   Fast check in. Friendly staff. Rooms were clean and well maintained.  Short walk to the magical kingdom.  Too busy to try the pool but it looked nice.  Across the street from restaurants and down the street from CVS.
Manager Response: Dear zippycomehappy,  Thank you for taking the time to comment on your stay. We are glad you acknowledged our friendly fast efficient service. This always helps motivate our staff. The walk is generally not too bad and takes around 15 minutes. In addition to the CVS there is a Walgreens opening next door. See you soon on your next adventure.

Summary Heading: Good value and close to Disney!
Summary: Our family stayed in the Kids suite (2 beds and a bunk bed) and it fit all 7 of us.  Walking distance to Disney which saved us a lot of money.  We will recommend to our friends or family.  They set up a cab service for us to get to the airport.  Only suggestion would be for a better breakfast but that's what you get if you are on a budget.
Manager Response: Dear Dave T,  Thank you for your suggestions. We really value customer feedback. It was wonderful having you all here. The bunk bed rooms are very popular with large families with many children. Always book early to ensure availability. Thank you again for your loyalty.

Summary: We stayed three nights - very small quarters for two adults and two tweens but we knew we weren't going to be there for very long. Unfortunately, the money you save is not worth it here. We were greatly disappointed in our stay. To have the air turned off on a 90+ day and come back from Disney for a cool off break for kids and parents that were over heated to not only have no air but also ZERO water to take a cold shower is not acceptable. To make matters worse when my husband went and asked about the air and was told that the "maids keep doing that' and that 'I would be pissed too' as the reason for it is appalling. If this has been known to happen than teaching the maids not to do it would be the expectation. To not have water because someone else near us is taking a shower is
Manager Response: Dear Tammy W,  We sincerely apologize for your experience at the islander. This matter is currently under investigation. It is very important to us that all guests receive the best value for their money. In order to keep improving our services we appreciate your feedback.

Summary: This cute, little hotel was clean, close enough to walk to Disneyland (about 15 minutes) and very reasonably priced.  They even accommodated us when at the very last minute we had to change our arrival date because of 3 sick little boys.  I highly recommend them.  It's also located about 5 minutes walking distance from IHOP.
Manager Response: Dear globetrecking,  Thank you for the positive response. It was our pleasure to help you with the dates. Emergencies in life can sometimes be unexpected. We totally understand. Hope the boys are doing well. See you all soon on your next adventure!

Summary: The Islander Inn & Suites is a small, family owned motel that is budget friendly. With that in mind, don't go there expecting big frills that you may get at a hotel (i.e. no hot breakfast).  Since we mostly spent our time in the Disney parks, it suited our needs for a place to sleep and park our car (without a daily parking fee). House keeping did a good job in cleaning our rooms and restocking our towels every day. The salt water pool was great...it was nice to get in and relax after fighting the crowds all day at Disneyland. There is no hot tub, which would have made it even better.  My biggest complaint is that the location is far from the entrance to Disneyland/California Adventure.  On the map, it doesn't look very far, but after spending an entire day at the Disney Parks,
Manager Response: Dear Shobana-fana789,  Thanks for reviewing your stay. A half a mile walk after a long day can be a bit tiring especially for kids. The ART is a convenient way to get around but can be expensive for larger families. We try our best to offer the best value for all our customers. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Close to the Disney Parks, a variety of restaurants, Very helpful staff
Summary: The front-desk is very helpful with inquiries over the phone as well as in person. One time we were late for breakfast but the staff set-up the buffet table again (it was a simple breakfast) so we can have ours. I would recommend this hotel for the location, price and service. The amenities is more than what I expected for a budget hotel: microwave, coffee machine, ref in the room.
Manager Response: Dear fairjyl,  Thank you for your vote of confidence in our establishment. We are always excited to read customer reviews. It gives us a great idea as to how we are doing. We always try to go the extra mile to make our customers happy. Thank you again for recommending us.

Summary: This was one of the most reasonably priced places we could find close to Disney, so we weren't expecting much but this place is GREAT! It is 0.6 mi from the Disneyland gates, there is a CVS on the corner so you can pick up snacks and drinks for the park. The hotel is very clean, modern and comfortable. The beds are comfortable and the bathrooms are nice. The biggest plus is that the room had a fridge and a microwave because the continental breakfast is poor with no protein and just packaged pastries coffee and power creamer also orange juice. So the microwave and fridge are nice to for the breakfast items that you buy at CVS. We would come back and recommend to friends.
Manager Response: Dear AJLCTK,  Thanks for taking the time to let us know how we are doing. Our location is very convenient. There is Walgreens opening next to us shortly along with a Starbucks and Chipotle. We hope to see you again soon and with your friends.

Summary: We've stayed here at least a dozen times over as many years.  Occasionally we try other locations around Disneyland but always find ourselves coming back to the Islander.    Check in is friendly and fast.  Rooms are clean and comfortable.  Great location.  We did both Disneyland and Knott's while here.  Drive to Knott's was short and very simple.    Breakfast is minimal muffins etc, but our kids love it.  Just wish it went a bit later, we slept in two mornings and missed it so had to go find breakfast elsewhere.  We will be back here for sure next time we visit this area.
Manager Response: Dear dmcinaz,  Thank you for taking the time to write to us. We are sorry that you missed our breakfast twice. Your feedback helps us improve our services. Thank you for being a loyal patron.

Summary: We arrived at this hotel at half six in the evening to be told that there was no room available for us, although we had not been notified of this in advance at all. This left us in a very vulnerable position as we were visiting the area for the first time ever. We ended up staying in a motel down the street which was of very poor quality after being told there was nowhere else available. $128 short and a very uncomfortable night later, we decided to book into a different hotel. We were very disappointed with the treatment we got from this hotel and will not be booking with them again if we return to the area.
Manager Response: Dear Sarah L,  We sincerely apologize for your treatment and inconvenience. This matter is currently under review. From the information we currently have the hotel team tried to get in touch with you via email through booking.com as you made the reservation through them. Your credit card came up as declined and we were unable to honor the reservation as per our policy. We went a step further and contacted booking.com on behalf of you and were advised to release the room. As a courtesy we waited until 6pm before doing so four hours after the 2pm check in time. We hope you enjoyed the free shuttle passes that were given to you. We also held a reservation for you for the following day but you never showed up but we did charge you any fees. We hope this clarifies any misunderstandings.

Summary: We are on 16 day trip and spent two nights here as we visited downtown Disney and a Anaheim Angels game. Rooms are very basic. They were clean. We had a four bed room with one very small bathroom. The pool was descent size and clean. It's very loud as Pool is right next to Katella Ave. Do not plan to have Continental breakfast here unless you like packaged pastry and powdered cream for coffee. They do have apple and bananas available. IHOP right around the corner was very good.
Manager Response: Dear Steve P,  Thank you for staying with us. Our prices our pretty competitive and our rooms are clean and simple. There is an Ihop, coffee bean & subway located around the corner. We hope you decide to spend a few night with us on your next visit. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Great location and easy on the wallet
Summary: This was our first time staying at the Islander but it won't be our last.  You can't beat the location.  From hotel door to Disney gate is about a 15-20 minute walk (a little longer at the end of the day because our zing had been zapped) so you save money right there not having to pay Disney parking fees.  There's a convenience store nearby and various restaurants all within walking distance.  Our family of six stayed in their suite which consists of three queen beds, one queen bed is in separate bedroom that you can close off from other room, and one bathroom.  As long as you plan your showers/baths the one bathroom is not a problem (at least it wasn't for us).  Beds were quite comfortable as were pillows although I thought pillows were awfully small.  Housekeeping did a great
Manager Response: Dear Melissa L,  Many have mentioned that they love our location. Not too close to the noisy street but not too far to take a walk. Thank you for you in depth review and your loyalty! We really appreciate it. Spread the good word :)

Summary: We love the Islander and this trip was another great one!  The location is awesome, the rooms are very comfortable and the staff is always helpful.  We had some issues with our schedule earlier this spring that prevented us using a reservation we had made, but the staff was extremely gracious in helping me work it out so we could come in June when we did.  For my family, there is only one place to stay in Anaheim, and that is the Islander.  Thanks again for having us - We'll definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Nels H,  We really loved having you here as our guests as well. Our amazing staff try to go above and beyond to make sure that you the customer experience the very best of service. Thank you for acknowledging! We look forward to having you here on your next adventure!

Summary: My boyfriend and I recently stayed here as we traveled through LA and went to Disney.  We are both working college students, so budget was a big consideration when choosing a place to stay.  We were very glad we found this place.  It's proximity to the park was very walk-able, and we were able to walk to and from the park quickly and easily.  The rooms were clean, updated, and well kept.  Noise was minimal, even though it sat right on a busy street and next to construction.  Our only complaint was that there was not enough parking, and the staff had to have us park in places that were not parking spots.
Manager Response: Dear Cassie L,  Great prices, wonderful service & clean rooms. That's us! We hope you spread the word out to all your college friends when they decide to come down to visit Disney. Parking can be a little challenging during peak weekends but we always make sure you get your spot. Its one free parking for room or suite. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Summary: This is the second time we've taken our family to Anaheim for Disneyland for a week, and the 2nd time we've stayed here.  Both times I looked into pretty much every accommodation option available, from AirBNB to fancy Hotels to Disneyland itself.  I know my way around google, and both times I could find nothing better than here. In fact, there was nothing else even close.  Price - quiet moderate given the location. Location - just the next block - 15 mins to the Disneyland property, or 30 mins to through the gates. Facilities - all you need - free breakfast, pool, comfortable and clean roooms. Service - excellent.  The staff are very helpful at all times  The only weaknesses I'd suggest are intermittent wifi, a coffee pot that didn't work (that I didn't mention to staff either,
Manager Response: Dear Stephen P,  Thank you for coming back! You guys are awesome as well! We have fixed the wifi issue :) We always try to fix any issues ASAP. Please do let us know if there are any concerns while you are checked in so we could make your stay wonderful! Sorry about the donuts :( Hope to see you here soon on your next vacation.
